11.title: The Will of Fire

112.content:
It's been three days since Naruto's fateful battle with the Akatsuki member known as Pain, and Naruto, as the hero who saved the village from total annihilation had become something of a celebrity. People from all over wanted to thank him or show their appreciation, from verbally thanking him too buying him Ramen at the temporary establishment of Ichiraku.

Because of this, Naruto had to change the location of his training twice due to constant interruptions. He only told Konohamaru where he was going, so he could reach out if something of importance happened. Naruto then headed out to the mountain range behind the Hidden Leaf Village.

Once there, he found a large tree stump with a smooth surface, as if it had been chopped down in one swing, making it an ideal spot for him to meditate and train his mind. His power is Sage Mode was substantial, but only allowed him to produce two Rasen-Shuriken. Since he wouldn't always have the time to prepare for battle as he did against Pain, Naruto decided to find a way to make that power last longer through training.

He started by clearing his mind of all thoughts(which wasn't too difficult) and just listened to the sound of the leaves rustling in the wind, the sounds of birds flapping their wings in the air. It was so quiet that he could even hear the rustling in the grass as bugs brushed them aside. Naruto made himself one with Nature, creating a vessel within himself for the energy to travel through.

However, what Naruto didn't realize was that there were different types of Nature Energy in the world, each with different effects. Naruto had only used the Frog variant during his training at Mount Myōboku and once since at a local waterfall outside the Hidden Leaf Village. Both times there were frogs and Toads present to draw power from, among other sources such as trees and rivers.

However, this time, the only living creatures that Naruto had to draw power from were insects, meaning he'd take on their properties instead, ignorant of this detail as his body began to shrink to match their size. It made even worse as he tried to accumulate as much Nature Energy as possible, not only shrinking himself smaller but faster as well.

A few minutes passed, and Naruto was still unaware that he'd been shrunk to only an inch tall on top of the stump. However, that was quickly about to change as someone else from the village approached the opening. The vibrations of her footsteps shaking the ground, getting Naruto's attention.

"That's weird, could have sworn Konahamaru said Big Bro Naruto would be right here." Boomed the voice of Moegi, leaving Naruto stunned after half an hour of absolute silence. Why was she yelling? She couldn't have been more than five feet away by the sound of her voice.

Naruto opened his eyes, still looking down and holding his head to compensate for his headache. Losing focus as he turned his head to the right, shocked by the scale of his surroundings. He was seeing the world through the eyes of a bug for the first time, and it was honestly more than a little intimidating.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/af/71/a9/...

"Huh, what is this?" Moegi boomed again, suddenly bringing Naruto's attention back to her. She was massive compared to him, her confused face hovering in the sky above him, in the same way, the Hokage's stone faces hovered above the village. She was holding a notepad in her hand, likely looking for a story for the village newspaper.

Naruto's spit pooled in the back of his mouth before being nervously swallowed as Moegi squinted to see his tiny body. "Is that...Big Bro Naruto?" Moegi asked, shocked by the fact that he was so puny compared to her now.

"Wait a second. That makes perfect sense. Of course, you shrunk yourself. That way, your training has a strong impact, defending yourself from giant animals would prove more difficult than training by yourself." Moegi explained it to herself a matter of factly, unable to believe that Naruto was dumb enough to shrink himself accidentally.

"But wait, you're trying to get stronger. I know, you obviously wanted to keep this a secret, but since I know now, I can be your training partner. Don't worry, I know how to keep a secret." Moegi said, perking up, not letting Naruto get a word in edgewise as she did all the talking.

Like everyone else in the village, she wanted to help repay Naruto somehow for saving them from Pain, and while she was no good to him as a training partner at his normal size, she was sure that she could help him while he was so tiny.

What does Moegi have in mind for a warm-up?

1.Moegi notes that the stump Naruto's standing on is a perfect sitting height for her, turning around to give Naruto a good look at her panty-clad butt under her skirt. She gives Naruto little time to prepare, giving him a brief explanation that his training is to attempt holding her over his head.

2.Moegi picks Naruto up and sits on the stump in his place, taking a moment to think of a way she can help him train. Eventually, dropping him on the ground between her knee-high sandals and removing them to show her bare feet. She then squeezes him between her feet, telling him to hold them off without a timer.

3.Moegi compares herself to one of Pain's giant summonings compared to Naruto, thinking that she would make an excellent practice partner for the one-inch tall ninja. Spicing up their battle with the condition that the winner will become the loser pupal, not believing she will win, but progressively becomes more confident during the fight.
112.title: Sage Mode Training With Moegi

114.content:
Things were quiet in the Hidden Leaf Village one, most of the nation's Shinobi were either out on missions or training. Meanwhile, Naruto Uzumaki and Sakura Haruno arrive at Lady Tsunade's office to receive their next mission.

"Naruto, Sakura, thank you for coming on such short notice. I'm afraid we may have underestimated the Akatsuki. The members we've fought against so far have been stronger than we originally anticipated. In fact, Shikamura collected data during his fight against the Akatsuki member Hidan that suggests the remaining members are even more powerful." Tsunade explained.

"So what? Bring them on! I'll flatten them with my new jutsu." Naruto said, acting as confident in his abilities as ever.

"Are you listening, you were hardly able to defeat one member of the Akatsuki, and that was with Kakashi Sensei's help. There's no way you can be this reckless." Sakura said, chiming into the conversation.

"Exactly my point, we can't forget that the Akatsuki is hunting all of the Jinchuriki and that includes you Naruto! We can't afford to have you captured by the enemy, especially when we don't even know what plans they have for the Tailed Beasts. I'm sorry, but you're forbidden to fight them again. It's too risky." Tsunade explained, already knowing Naruto probably wouldn't listen to reason.

"As if, I haven't been training all these years just to run away now! I'm out of here!" Naruto yelled, turning to face the door only to find Sakura blocking his path.

"In that case, we have no choice. Do it Sakura." Tsunade ordered her apprentice.

"Wait, do what?" Naruto asked confused, turning his gaze back between Tsunade and Sakura. Meanwhile, Sakura formed several hand signs in the following order, Boar, Ox, Bird, Snake, and finally a sign he couldn't recognize.

"Ninja Art: Shrinking Jutsu!" Sakura announced, causing a cloud of smoke to appear around Naruto. The blonde ninja panicked, hoping he'd misheard Sakura.

However, as the smoke cloud cleared Naruto realized he wasn't so lucky. Instead of seeing his teammate standing before, Naruto now saw five massive toes resting on a large platform. His gaze shifted upwards, following Sakura's tall sandals up the pink-haired kunoichi's legs. Followed by her shorts and skirt, and eventually leading up to Sakura's face. Her green eyes staring down at her now inch tall teammate, who took a strong resemblance to insect standing in front of her sandals.

"Now bring Naruto here, and I'll explain your mission." Tsunade announced, taking Naruto's attention off Sakura for a moment. Having said that, when Naruto turned his attention back to Sakura he was surprised to see his field of vision dominated by her gloved fingers. They surround him, inching his body between her thumb and index fingers before whisking him off the ground.

Sakura brought him up to about chest level before walking towards Lady Tsunade's desk, forcing Naruto attention to be focused on her now gigantic breasts. She was only about a larger A to lower B cup at normal size, but shrinking Naruto had made them over 50 times larger. From his current distance, he could see every little movement they made. Swaying slightly from side to side and bouncing with each step forward.

Soon enough she reached Tsunade's desk, dropping Naruto on the surface. However, without calculating the length of the fall from Naruto's perspective, Sakura released him from a higher height than she anticipated. Naruto acted quickly on this, landing in such a way that caused him to roll forward upon landing.

What he saw next was surprising, Tsunade's breasts resting on her desk. The massive mammaries undoubtedly dwarfing Sakura's breasts by leaps and bounds. If the younger girl's breasts were the size of hills, then the Hokage's bosom could easily be compared with mountains.

"Ahem, Now for the details of your mission. Sakura, you are to keep Naruto safe and hidden from the Akatsuki. You have full permission from me too use whatever means necessary and involve anyone else you see fit." Tsunade announced, looking down at Naruto.

"This is an A-Rank mission. We can't allow the Nine-Tails to fall into enemy hands. Sakura will be acting as your guardian, and you will remain hidden in public places at all times." Tsunade continued, motion to Sakura to take Naruto away.

"Yes milady, I understand." Sakura said, accepting her mission and reaching down to pick up Naruto. He threw his hand up in a feeble attempt to protect himself, Sakura's strong finger's easily breaking his stance and trapping him between her thumb and index finger.

"Hey, put me down! Sa-Ku-Ra! Put me down!" Naruto yelled, trying to break himself free of Sakura's fingers. During which the cherry blossom ninja brought naruto under her green eyes gaze.

"Listen Naruto, Lady Tsunade's right. We can't allow you to be captured. The Akatsuki already have 4 tailed beasts, and another has been reported missing. Trust me this is for the best." Sakura said gently, trying to calm Naruto down.

"One more thing, originally I'd planned to have a special necklace made to contain Naruto. One with a seal placed on it to contain the Nine-Tailed Fox's Chakra. Unfortunately, the Anbu Black Ops unit hasn't been able to figure it out yet, so you'll just have to get by carrying him inside your clothing for the time being.

Sakura and Naruto both turned to Tsunade blushing. "Wait, what?" they asked, both for different reasons. That when Naruto started to think this arrangement wasn't going to be so bad after all. He'd wanted to get close to Sakura for years now, and now Lady Tsunade had given him an opportunity to see her private areas up close.

"You heard me Sakura, keep him in something your wearing. Put him somewhere before you leave so nobody outside this building sees him like this." Tsunade said firmly, not wanting to be questioned by her apprentice again.

"I understand, forgive me." Sakura said, preparing to put Naruto___________.

1. Down her sandal- Sakura unzips her knee tall sandals and drops Naruto down the shaft of her boot like footwear and infusing the insole with Charka to stick Naruto back to the surface so he doesn't slide out.

2. Between her butt-cheeks- Sakura decides Naruto will be least annoying if she drops him down the back of her panties, wedging him between her buttcheeks as a way to keep him secure.

3. Inside of her cleavage- Sakura grudgingly accepts to put Naruto between her breasts, pushing him into the depths of her cleavage before leaving Tsunade's office. However, the intense heat of the village quickly causes Sakura to sweat, making Naruto regret his desire to be close to Sakura's boobs.

12.title: Peas and Carrots

122.content:
"Awe, pretty please Bulma. We have to start training again so we can get stronger." Goku whined, after being told by Bulma that he and Vegeta were not allowed to go back to Lord Beerus's world for training.

"No, the last time you left Earth. Frezia attacked, and we almost died." Bulma stated, making her case that they should continue their training on Earth.

"Relax, we can always have Kararot teleport us back here." Vegeta said, rationalizing why they should be allowed to leave.

"Yeah, but last time it took all of Gohan's energy just to reach you." Bulma countered, waving her fist at the two Saiyans.

"Whatever, call Whis to Earth. We'll be leaving tomorrow. " Vegeta replied, leaving with Goku to go spare in preparation to continue their training.

"What's wrong with those two? I mean, aren't they strong enough? If only I had a way to make them listen to me." Bulma said to herself, forming an idea in the back of her mind. There was an invention she could use that would make Goku and Vegeta listen to her. One she built many years ago when she was only 16. Of course, she'd have to make a few adjustments first before it was ready to be used on Goku and Vegeta.

"If I make the necessary modifications, then that could work." Bulma told herself, though she couldn't even remember the last time she used it or where it was. The blue haired woman then proceeded towards her lab, preparing for a full night of technological experimentation.

---The Next Day---

Goku and Vegeta were waiting impatiently for Bulma and Whis to arrive, standing out on the Capsule Corp Building's lawn. Goku was excited for any excuse to get back to his training so he could make himself stronger, while Vegeta was determined not to allow his longtime rival to advance ahead of him again.

Meanwhile, Bulma was hiding around the curved corner of the Capsule Corp sphere building. She looked at her wrist, adjusting the setting on her new and improved version of the microband. Once, when she first set off on her journey to find the seven Dragonballs nearly 30 years ago, Bulma used this device to shrink herself down to 5 inches tall. However, thanks to some improvements she's made not only can Bulma use the watch to shrink others, but she can also control the size to make them much smaller.

She hadn't run any human or Saiyan tests for that matter, just shrinking boxes and machinery in her lab. Luckily, she had two test subjects close by that she could experiment on. Bulma peeked around the corner, adjusting the device for distance and the size she wanted Goku and Vegeta to become. Just under half an inch tall should be about the right size for her to control them, they were still powerful fighters and could prove troublesome at a larger measurement.

Bulma double checked her wrists and clicked the button that would bring Goku and Vegeta down to size, literally. Within moments Bulma found herself watching in awe as the two alien warriors shrunk before her very eyes. Losing half their height each in the blink of an eye, now they were not taller than Trunks or Goten. But their shrinking didn't stop there, not by a long shot.

"Vegeta, what's going on?" Goku asked as the world around them grow several times over in size, their surroundings becoming gigantic in comparison to their shrinking bodies.

"Kakarot, what have you done?" Vegeta asked, just as confused as Goku for once. Blaming his longtime rival for this turn of events.

The pair of Saiyans continued shrinking in size until they heads were well below the grass line of the Capsule Corporation's front lawn. Now they were as tiny as ants compared to someone like Bulma, slinking around the corner as the two finished shrinking.

Boom, Boom, Boom, Boom!

The tiny Saiyans began too feel strong vibrations, moving through the earth beneath their feet. Each one more powerful than the last, something or someone was coming. "Kakarot, do you feel that?" Vegeta asked, taking a fighting stance with Goku back to back. "Yeah, feels like footsteps." Goku answered, their warrior instincts taking over and assuming they'd been shrunk by a new enemy. However, nothing could prepare them for what came next.

Boom, BOom, BOOm, BOOM!

The vibrations continued to get even stronger, just how massive was this opponent they were supposed to do battle with? A large shadow presents itself over their bodies, casting itself over them a mile long. The two were awestruck, unable to move a muscle as they looked up to see an 850-foot tall Bulma towering overhead.

"Hey boys, I hope your ready for some special training." Bulma teased, feeling as if she were talking down to bugs now that she'd made them so tiny. The same was true for them, though they didn't exactly see Bulma as a bug, more like a goddess 3 times taller than Shenron himself.

"Bulma! What is the meaning of this?" Vegeta asked, pulling himself together after coming to terms with the new size difference between him and his wife. Meanwhile Goku just stood there saying nothing.

Bulma bent down to get a closer look at Goku and Vegeta, almost losing them in the grass at her full height. "Well, I couldn't let you two leave to go to Lord Beerus's world, and since you wouldn't listen to reason I decided to take matter's into my own hands." Bulma said confidently, reaching down to scoop Goku and Vegeta up.

Bulma's hand hit the ground dragging along the dirt, nearly knocking the tiny pair off their feet as she picked them up in the palm of her hand. She lifted them up to about chest level, keeping them just under her now massive breasts, each about equal in size to the Capsule Corp building.

"Wait, so we're not gonna be able to train?" Goku asked, not seeming to bother by the fact that Bulma shrunk them and having one track mind towards getting stronger.

"Of course you can still train, that's why I shrunk you. You'll just have to get used to training under me instead of Whis." Bulma teased, winking at the micro Saiyans.

"And just what do you know about fighting?" Vegeta asks, skeptical about being trained by someone who's never been in an actual fight herself.

"Lots actually, I've been watching Goku for almost thirty years. I can think of more than a few ways to train you that are almost guaranteed to make you stronger." Bulma says back. Vegeta however, wasn't buying it, him and Goku both have reached Super Saiyan Blu and attained the power of the gods. What could a human woman like Bulma possibly teach them?

What kind of training does Bulma have in store for them first?

1. Bulma suggests that she put Vegeta's worries to rest with a sparring match, confident that she'll come out as the winner she offers a scenario where the one who performs best gets a reward, while the one who performs worst gets punished.

2. Bulma takes off her boots and drops one of the shrunken Saiyans in each, telling them that their first task is to endure the rest of the day living under her full weight.

3.Bulma brings Goku and Vegeta inside where she reveals that by shrinking them, she's neutralized their ability to go Super Saiyan. Placing them on a seat(Chair, couch, ect...) She tells them she wants to see if they can hold her over their heads while she sits on top of them. Can they handle it? Probably not.
122.title: Bulma's The Strongest Now

123.content:
"I assume there's a reason you summoned me here Caulifla? Besides making small talk." Vados smiled, preparing to leave Planet Sadala after being treated to local delicacy by the ruffian Saiyan. Already having a pretty good idea about what the young woman was hoping for.

"What are you? A mind-reader or something? Well, since you asked I was hoping you could bring that Goku guy here for me so I can learn how to reach Super Saiyan 3." Caulifla answers, intending to get stronger a quickly as possible through training with the Universe 7 Saiyan.

"A simple task." Vados stated confidently, holding one hand out flat between her and Caulifla, before pulling her staff out of thin air with the other. The angel quickly spun the staff around, causing the black orb at it's end to shine brightly, turning it's light on the center of her palm.

The light then moved into her cupped hand, taking a humanoid form and transforming into Goku within seconds right in front of Caulifla. Only problem was that he was only an inch tall, disappointing Caulifla greatly, wondering what she could learn from the bug sized Saiyan.

"What's going on her?" Goku asked dumbfounded, looking up at the angel who had summoned him, she kinda looked like Whis and was wearing similar clothes. Vados smiled, nodding with closed eyes to acknowledge Goku's presence in the palm of her hand, before Goku noticed a lingering shadow.

He sensed an odd presence, along with a powerful godly aura emanating from directly behind him. Quickly turning around to see Caulifla's face blown up to immense proportion, brought within mere centimeters of Goku's tiny frame.

"Aaaah!" Goku yelled in shock, falling onto his butt at the very sight of the rebellious Saiyan woman, enacting a joyous giggle from Vados as she watched the scene unfold. "Oh, hello there. You're that Saiyan from universe 6, right? Cauliflower?" Goku asked, having forgotten her in only a few short weeks.

"It's Caulifla!" she yelled, outraged by the fact that she hadn't made a more lasting impression on someone who she'd thrashed so thoroughly, at least while she was merged with Kale as Kefla before his Ultra Instinct saved him. Her defiant scream forcing Goku to cover his ears, the sound echoing in his eardrums even after she'd already closed her mouth.

"Jeez, alright lady." Goku apologized, pulling down his hands in the hopes of getting an answer as to what exactly was going on here. However, when he looked back to where Cauilifa's face was, all he saw was her bare midriff as she had returned to her full height and had begun a new conversation with Vados.

"You've got to be kidding me Vados, is this a joke or something?" Caulifla asked, not finding it very funny if it was. Completely ignoring Goku as she shoved her fists down in anger, stomping her foot into the dirt.

"Of course not, instant transportation between universe's requires some compartmentalization, in Goku's case that means shrinking down to the size he is now. All the same he should still assist you greatly in the task at hand, With his Super Saiyan Blue form and Ultra Instinct techniques, he's too powerful an opponent for you to overcome. This new size should afford you the chance to tip the scales in your favor." Vados explained, leading Caulifla to believe that she'd been underestimated. At her size, she could stomp Goku into the dirt with little to no effort on her part whatsoever.

"Ugh, but does he have to be so pint-sized?" Caulifla asked, wondering what she had to gain from all this.

"I could send him back if this form displeases you. However, it could be weeks before we can arrange for him to come back at proper size." Vados clarified, creating a strobing ball of light around Goku, preparing to send him away.

"Not a chance, now hand him over!" Caulifla objected, holding out her hands together in front of Vados to accept Goku. Willing to take any help she could get in reaching the next level of her training, if nothing else Goku would serve as a well of information for her.

Vados smiled as her ploy reached the exact conclusion she'd expected, the shell encasing Goku vanishing into thin air before tilting her hand sideways, allowing Goku to fall into the female Saiyan's embrace. He tried to fly up, but found himself unable to stop his decent before being caught by Caulifla's waiting hands.

"Now you take good care of him, I'll be back at the end of your training to send him home." Vados announced, taping her staff twice and taking off in a ray of light off world, leaving Caulifla to her own devices. Now in charge of Goku, Caulifla mused over several different ways she could integrate the bug-sized Saiyan into her training schedule.

The first path involved finding out how strong Goku actually was at his new size, forcing him into a sparring match where he has to go all out against her, seeing just how well he could hold his own. Another path involved Goku undergoing some special training of his own to toughen up in preparation to help her, testing his resilience and durability along the way to see if what Vados said was true. Finally, she considered bringing Kale into the mix, so they could both reach Super Saiyan 3 together through training with Goku. Will their combined might prove too much for Goku to endure?

1. Not entirely convinced that Goku is up to the job of training her, Caulifla challenges Goku to a duel, with the winner becoming the other's master. Making him promise not to hold back against her. But will she be the one to underestimate him solely due to his small size?

2. Caulifla says there is no time to waste, acclimating Goku to his new size by forcing him into her shoe, turning him into her personal insole for the duration of a full length training session.

3. Caulifla flies over to where Kale is to shows the tiny Goku to her best friend and honorary sister. Explaining to the nervous woman her plans to fight Goku in a two on one battle, but could Goku still get the best of them with Super Saiyan Blue and the Kaioken?
123.title: Training With a Supersized Saiyan

choices: Towered Over by Fairy Tail’s Newest Member
13.content:
Fairy Tail, Story can take place at anytime, during the Grand Magic Games, before the seven years on Tenrou Island, After the war with Tartaros. If you want specific characters to be involved please set a chain of events for the story to follow. I’ll kick this off with a total of four choices.

1. While reading a request from the board inside the Fairy Tail guild hall Natsu is shrunk, caused by a spell similar to the body swapping spell that caused him to trade bodies with Loke. Soon after he is found at an inch tall by his new teammate and the newest member of Fairy Tail Lucy Heartfilla.

2. Lucy shrinks during the Grand Magic Games just before her battle with the fire mage from Raven Tail Flare Corona. Unfortunately for Lucy she shrunk after agreeing to the match and is unable to back out. How long will she last against an opponent forty or more times her size?

3. While agreeing to help Wendy in a training match Natsu gets too fired up and scares Wendy into using one of her Sky Dragon Slayer Secret Arts, pulling his attack into a vortex and shrinking it so it doesn’t harm her, unfortunately Natsu gets caught up in her defense and ends up shrinking as well.

4. Ezra decides to shrink Grey in order to scare him out of his obsessive desire to strip while using his Ice Maker Magic. The only question you have too answer is how far she will go in order to achieve her goal?

Of course there are plenty of girls in Fairy Tail not listed above and I’m sure we all wanna see them in this story. If you have a favorite make an addition yourself in ‘More Choices’ or pitch your idea to me directly.
13.title: Fairy Sized Tales

131.content:
Natsu arrived at the guild hall early one in order to get the first pick of job requests for him and Lucy now that they were officially a team. After taking on the Dark Guild Eisenwald and stealing an S Class Quest from the second floor Natsu felt as if he could handle anything so his only goal was to take the request off the board with the highest reward. His attention was first drawn to one posted right on top of all the others, the reward listed at the top in bold lettering was Five Million Jewel. With a reward that high he must have been expected to fight off a seriously tough monster like a Wyvern or as much as a hundred Vulcans, either way he was excited to put his skills to the task.

Unfortunately for Natsu this didn't seem to be a physical task, according to this piece of paper they were looking for someone to translate the ancient text depicted on the surface. Normally this wasn't Natsu's strong suit but the language on this paper was the same kind as Igneel had taught Natsu growing up. Maybe if he finished this request and claimed the reward he could ask for information that might lead him to his father.

"Oggo daru Kir zanna rinko kner" Natsu read aloud, all but forgetting their instance with the Changeling spell that cause him and Loke to swap bodies. Suddenly the page began to glow brightly, exuding a blinding blue light forcing Natsu to shield his eyes as he dropped the paper. He could hear it being blown around by the wind until it hit the ground, a familiar feeling soon overtook Natsu's body. Was it that Changeling spell again? If so what would happen? There was nobody around for him to swap bodies with.

When the light faded and Natsu was able to open his eyes again he found himself faced with a big surprise, literally. The entire Guild Hall was absolutely gigantic, big enough to cover the entire town of Magnolia under its roof. Natsu had been shrunk down to only an inch tall.

"What the? How the hell did this happen to me?" Natsu asked himself, having little time to answer the questions he had before the front door of the guild opened for the next member of Fairy Tail to arrive that morning.

https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/powe...

Looking across the guild Natsu realised that it was Lucy Heartfilia his teammate that he'd come here to pick a job for that had entered the building, she must have been here too meet up with him. Only problem was that he was the size of a bug compared to her.

The towering blonde's knee tall heeled boots send powerful vibrations through the guild's floorboards, felt by Natsu even at a distance. She continued walking in the direction of the request board, not seeing Dragon Slayer fang or pink hair of Natsu anywhere. Did he forget about their plan to meet up and grab the first request? She picked the last one so it was Natsu's turn to pick a job request. Of course knowing Natsu he'd probably just pick the job that would allow him to cause the maximum amount of destruction possible to some poor town plagued by monsters.

Lucy laughed at her thoughts before noticing a piece of paper on the floor, she placed her feet on either end of the page before reaching down to pick it up. Natsu saw this as his best chance to gain his new teammate’s attention before it was too late. The pick haired mage ran towards the piece of paper before him, yelling up at the blonde Celestial Wizard towering overhead.

“Hey Lucy it’s me. Down here!” he called at the top of his lung, although Lucy didn’t seem to hear him as she lifted it off the ground. She brought it to level with her ample bosom, reading it and mouthing the words to herself.

“Don’t read that Lucy, you’ll end up small like me.” Natsu warned, his words not even coming close to reaching Lucy’s eardrums from the floor. However strangely enough nothing happened, Lucy remained a giant through the eyes of the shrunken Dragon Slayer.

“That’s weird, this must be the shrinking spell I’ve heard so much about. According to Sorcerers Weekly more than half the members of Blue Pegasus were shrunk when a member accidentally cast the spell. But what’s it doing on the floor, I mean who would be stupid enough to fall…for…this.” Lucy paused, spacing out her words as she developed an idea in the back of her mind, she only hoped she was wrong.

However as Lucy looked down she saw exactly as imagined, a pink haired bug standing before her tall boots. “You have got to be kidding me! Natsu?” Lucy scolded, realizing Natsu had accidentally shrunk himself. Not that she was surprised by this turn of events in the slightest. Only Natsu could be that stupid.

“Hey there Lucy, um do you think I could get a hand down here?” Natsu said, believing himself to be saved. Instead Lucy decided to go another route, lifting her foot off the ground and bring it over Natsu, casting a large shadow over him.

“Lucy wait, what are you..?” Was all Natsu could ask before Lucy decided to bring her foot down hard into the floorboards below, the tiny Dragon Slayer narrowly avoiding her powerful stomp.

“Lucy, what the hell was that? There’s people walking down here you know!” Natsu yelled, looking up to see an angry Lucy staring back at him.

“Well it serves you right, that spell is dangerous. I mean we’re lucky it was just you, everyone in the guild could have been shrunk.” Lucy announced, placing her hands on her hips.

“I’m sure Erza won’t be too happy to hear about this, even I’m a little scared to think of what she might do to you at that size.” Lucy said, much to Natsu’s dismay. Natsu began to sweat, a normal sized Erza was already as scary as a mountain sized monster so he could only imagine how terrifying a gigantic Erza would be.

“Please Lucy, I’m begging you here. Anything but that, I’d never survive Erza’s wrath.” Natsu requested of Lucy, hoping to appeal to her nice side. That is if she had one. “Can’t you just bring me to Levy, she can reverse this right? We don’t have to tell Erza about any of this.” Natsu said, hoping to take the easy way out.

“Not a chance, she already wasted enough time helping use reverse that Changeling spell mess. Which you caused might I add.” Lucy said, wanting Natsu to spend some time at this size before she even thought about returning him to normal.

“I won’t bring you to Erza but you still deserve to be punished, otherwise I’m afraid you’ll never learn your lesson.” Lucy announced, and with nobody around to assign Natsu’s punishment besides her it was clear that Lucy would be deciding his penalty.

What does she have in mind for the shrunken Dragon Slayer?

1. Lucy decides that Natsu's punishment should be carried out inside of a jail cell, however since he's too small for any conventional prison Lucy decides to stuff him in between her toes for the foreseeable future. Sure that he'll learn his lesson sooner or later.

2. Lucy decides to use Natsu's motion sickness against him, driving him into the center of her cleavage and going for a long walk around the town of Magnolia with him entombed inside of her breast flesh.

3. Lucy decides to drop Natsu down the back of her panties during her walk home, telling him his punishment will begin once they get to her apartment.
131.title: Towered Over by Fairy Tail’s Newest Member

choices: Passenger of the Sky Maiden's Backside
133.content:
We find Natsu and Wendy in the mountain ranges on the outskirts of the town of Magnolia where the Fairy Tail Guild Hall and it's member's reside. After recent battles in the Grand Magic Games Wendy decided that she needed to get stronger as a member of Fiore's number one guild, turning to her fellow Dragon Slayer Natsu Dragneel for guidance.

She looked up to the pink haired mage for his mastery of the Dragon Slayer arts, particularly his combat abilities which were so strong he'd managed to beat two other Dragon Slayers at the same time. Naturally, this would be the primary focus of her training with Natsu as the two set off without their Exceed partners.

"Wendy, I hope you're ready for some serious combat training!" Natsu said excitedly, getting pumped up to raise Wendy's skill level and asses her current powers.

"Ye-Yeah, I'm ready!" Wendy confirmed, trying to sound as confident as possible as the two Dragon Slayers got into their respective fighting stances. A gust of wind kicked up dust between the two mages, each wondering who would be the first to declare an attack. Of course, it didn't take a genius to figure out that Natsu would make the first move. He leaped into the air, using the sun as a backdrop to disguise his first attack.

"Fire Dragon Iron Fist!" Natsu declared, coating his fist in flames and thrusting his fist towards Wendy. The young Sky Maiden, not confident in her ability to directly block Natsu's attack took a different approach.

"Oh, swift winds that run the heavens. Vernier!" Wendy chanted, casting an enchantment on herself that would increase her overall speed. Shortly after taking evasive actions to dodge Natsu's strike, his flaming fist meeting with the dirt as Wendy maneuvered around him.

Next, she focused on a counter-attack "I call upon thee, the starward fight to claim the heavens. Arms!" Wendy chanted, adding a strength enhancement on top of her boosted speed to increase the power of her attacks. "Sky Dragon Roar!" She yelled, attacking from Natsu's right side with a massive gust of wind shot from her mouth.

"Fire Dragon Roar!" Natsu yelled, responding to Wendy's counterstrike with his variation of her breath attack. Fire and wind met between the two Dragon Slayers, their magic power duking it out before Natsu's flames overpowered Wendy's magic. Even with her enchantments, there was a clear difference in their abilities.

Wendy moved to dodge, landing off balance and creating an opening for Natsu to attack. He dashed towards the young girl, coating his entire body in flames. Natsu then raised his hands over his head, gathering the fire into a single point. "Fire Dragon Brilliant Flame!" Natsu yelled as he tossed a giant fireball in Wendy's direction.

Wendy froze for a brief moment, thinking she couldn't possibly deflect or repel Natsu's attack. That's when she remembered a third Dragon Slayer Secret Art that Grandeeney had left her along with the Sky Drill and Milky Way. However, she'd never before pulled off the move in her training.

Wendy stood up tall, gathering her magic power she planted her feet firmly at her sides. "Sky Dragon Secret Arts, Act of Compression!" Wendy yelled, creating a massive vortex that swallowed Natsu's magic in seconds. Unfortunately, the giant twister expanded so much that Natsu himself got sucked into the vortex she created. He tried to stand his ground but with nothing to hold onto he was helpless before Wendy's sudden power up.

With Natsu's magic trapped and no knowledge of her friend's predicament, Wendy began controlling the vortex with her hands. Making it smaller and smaller she suffocated Natsu's flame attack, shrinking it down to an ember in moments before it completely disappeared within Wendy's tornado of magic power.

After successfully defending herself Wendy released the spell and the vortex unraveled into thin air. She was so proud of herself, pulling off an advanced technique she didn't even believe possible. She turned to Natsu, looking to thank him for drawing this power out of her. But he was nowhere to be found.

"Natsu, where did you go?" Wendy asked, stepping out into the clearing to look for him. Meanwhile, Natsu sat up rubbing his head after getting caught in Wendy's spell. That's when he noticed strange vibrations traveling through the ground, almost like miniature earthquakes.

On the contrary, they were footsteps. Most likely originating from some giant magical creature like a Wyvern or giant Vulcan. Natsu turned to towards the source of the vibrations, shocked when he saw a giant human's foot land at his side. He instantly recognized the footwear and thought it was impossible, looking up to see a massive Wendy Marvell towering over him.

"Wendy, down here! Wendy!" Natsu yelled, repeating the young girl's name as she looked at her surroundings. She seemed to be confused, reacting to his call for her attention.

"Natsu! Wait, where are you?" She asked, her ears picking up on his voice enhanced by her Dragon Slayer magic. Finally, she looked down, turning her attention on what appeared to be a bug between her sandal-clad feet. "Is that you Natsu?" Wendy asked, shocked by how tiny he'd become. He was barely an inch tall.

"Hey Wendy, how'd you get so big?" Natsu asked, surprised by the young girl's size. Easily dwarfing him at over fifty times his size. Her black thigh high socks alone reached heights taller than the Fairy Tail Guild Hall, leading up to her cotton white panties hidden from the rest of the world under her skirt. Wendy still not realizing that she'd left herself exposed to the bug-sized Natsu.

"What, I'm not taller Natsu. You've shrunk." Wendy clarified, forcing Natsu to observe his surroundings to see that she was right. It wasn't just Wendy, but everything surrounding him was gigantic, absolutely enormous. "Really, but how did this happen?" Natsu asked.

"I'm sorry, it must have been my magic. The spell I used concentrates high force winds to compress magic power and makes it smaller. You must have gotten swept up and shrunk with your attack." Wendy explained sadly, her voice full of regret. Still not understanding how a spell that shrinks magic power could also make a person smaller. Forgetting that on Earthland all living things contain magic.

"Don't worry Wendy. I'm sure somebody can fix this. But first, do you think you can give me a lift back to the guild." Natsu asked, not wanting to walk all the way back to Magnolia.

Wendy cheered up, Natsu was right she thought. Fairy Tail was home to all kinds of powerful mages, surely someone from the guild could reverse what she'd done to him. There was just one small problem.

"Natsu, if you don't mind could we keep this between as few people as possible? I still want to get stronger, but I'm worried that people won't want to train with me if they think I'll accidentally shrink them everytime they spare against me ." Wendy responded, not that it would scare off too many members in Fairy Tail.

"Yeah, sure thing Wendy. Do what you have to, I'd rather not have Erza see me like this anyways." Natsu shivered, the thought of a three hundred foot tall Erza terrifying him. She was already as scary as any monster at her current height.

Wendy giggled nervously, agreeing with Natsu's sentiment. She wouldn't want to end up on the wrong side of a gigantic Erza either. Wendy reached down and picked Natsu up between her fingers, before dropping him into her palm, lifting him to chest level.

~Wow, I can't believe how tiny he is. It almost feels like I'm holding an insect, I better be careful with him.~ Wendy thought to herself as she looked down at Natsu. Then she realized that she didn't exactly have a plan to hide him from her guildmates or the people of Magnolia for that matter.

"Um Natsu, if we're gonna keep you shrinking a secret then I'll have to hide you somewhere. I don't have any pockets n this outfit so I can't guarantee what I have in mind will be very pleasant." Wendy announced nervously, but Natsu was unphased by her words.

"That's fine Wendy! Just take me out as soon as you can." Natsu announced, willingly subjecting himself to being kept wherever the young Sky Maiden choose. Likely somewhere she could feel him constantly moving, so he doesn't accidentally slip out. She didn't want to risk losing him, preparing to deposit him inside her ________ so he can't fall out by mistake.

1. Bra, Wendy takes advantage of her small boobs. Not taking into full account how massive the orbs the flesh might appear to someone of Natsu's current stature. She then walks back towards Magnolia, thinking about what it would be like to have bigger boobs, deciding to take Natsu back to Lucy's Apartment for help.

2. Thigh Highs, Wendy slips Natsu down one of her tight high socks, trapping him inside the fabric while she searches the town of Magnolia for Levy at her usual hangouts such as the library and the park. Hoping her knowledge gather from books can help wendy reverse the effects of the shrinking. Meanwhile, Natsu sinks deeper and deeper down her thigh highs until he falls under Wendy's foot.

3. Panties(back), while it's not her first choice, Wendy admits that it would be easiest to keep Natsu close to her skin, with a lack of better options she drops him down the back of her underwear to feel him against her soft buttcheeks. Meanwhile, she makes the decision to try using her healing magic on Natsu once her magic power recovers.
133.title: Shrunk by Wendy’s Sky Magic

choices: Sky Dragon & Sky God's Peaceful Reunion
1332.content:
Wendy looked over her body, unable to find a place where she could put her tiny friend. She was wearing a red shirt and a mini skirt. The same dress she had at the time of the events in Edolas world.

Unfortunately, a strong wind rushed by her, nearly blowing Natsu away as it left. Wendy, acting quickly was barely capable of catching Natsu and completely covered his tiny body in her palms.

Wendy knew she couldn't make it too Magnolia like this, she had to think about how she could hide Natsu, not only from the other members of the guild but also from the forces of nature. The little girl looked at her body again. Her legs were dressed in dark blue knee socks...

"Hehe ... I'm sorry Natsu-san, I don't think that you will like my idea...” Wendy laughed nervously when she came up with a strange plan to keep Natsu safe and secure.

With her two fingers of left hand, she pulled back the edge of her knee socks at the thigh-high level, thereby making a small gap between her skin and the fabric of the sock. However, this little gap looked more like a black hole to nowhere for tiny Natsu.

“Try to hold out and not fall down to my foot, because I will not be able to pull you out until we return to the guild.” Explained Wendy, slowly pushing Natsu into her knee socks.

'He looks so insignificant compared to me. Natsu...who always was like a big brother to me, now nothing more than insect compare to me..who knows...maybe with this power I can become the strongest wizard in Fairy Tail...' Wendy mused, keeping her thoughts private as she put Natsu in her tall sock.

“Wendy, I don't think this is a good idea!” Natsu tried to protest, clinging to the edge of a knee sock with both hands. But his strength was minimal compared to Wendy's now, he has no power here. His fate was completely dependent on the young Dragon Slayer’s will.

"Sorry, Natsu! But I don’t have any other choice! ”Wendy said, and without waiting for another response from Natsu release the edge of her sock. Because of the frivolity of the child, Wendy didn’t think that she had stretched the edge of her sock strongly enough, from which realizing it at one moment would be like a shot from a bow. Like an arrow tiny Natsu immediately flew towards Wendy's thigh and crashed into her skin, beginning to quickly fall down her stocking.

"Wendy!" Natsu screamed but Wendy didn't hear him anymore.

Natsu had time to grab the fabric of the sock during the fall. He could hardly determine his location. Inside the sock was dark and Natsu could hardly see the outside world through the fabric of Wendy’s sock.

"Maybe I'm....at knee level...I should....climb," said Natsu as he decided to climb as high as possible as too not to fall into the place where there was the terrible smell of foot sweat. At such a ridiculous size, the fabric of the sock looked completely different. Natsu saw every thread that makes this sock. These threads were a nice ledge for which Natsu could cling.

At this time, Wendy stretched a bit after the fight with Natsu.
"Alright! I should find a way to help Natsu now!" said Sky Dragon Slayer and made her first step with a tiny passenger inside her knee socks

*BOOM!*

Wendy took a step. The just single step of little girl shook the whole foundation of Natsu's world and he fell again. This time he fell on Wendy’s foot. But the tiny dragon slayer had no chance to stabilize his position.

*BOOM!*

Each one of Wendy's steps was accompanied by a loud rumble and a strong earthquake. Natsu slowly sliding down over Wendy's ankle until he found himself under her sole. Realizing the hopelessness of his position, he waited until Wendy took another step.

*BOOM!*

Using the force from her step Natsu quickly crawled to the only safe place he could find, under the arch of her sole. Now all that remained was for one of the most powerful wizards in Fairy Tail was to wait until this little girl removed her sweaty socks.

What happens next?

1. Wendy passes Lucy's apartment on the way to the guild, deciding to stop in to see if the celestial mage could be of any help returning Natsu to normal size. But how will Wendy react when Lucy decides to take advantage of Natsu's new size. Forcing him to serve them for always being such a pain in her butt, breaking into her apartment, and so on...

2. Wendy makes it to the guild hall with no problems posed to her whatsoever. She finds Levy exactly where expected in the guild's Library downstairs and asks for her assistance in bringing Natsu back to his normal size.

3. On her way to the Guild Hall, Wendy encounters Chelia who she battled during the Grand Magic Games. Afterward, they became friends and Chelia suggests they go on a walk to catch up on what's been going on. Wendy can't think of a good excuse and agrees, thinking Natsu will just have to endure the afternoon under her foot. Assuring herself it can't be that bad as the two girls walk around town.
1332.title: Sinking Under Wendy's Foot

choices: On a pillow next to her
13322.content:
It was a very hot day in the kingdom the Fiore in the heights of its summer season, so after 5 minutes of walking, Wendy had already begun to work up a sweat.

She and Natsu had moved far away from the guild for their sparring match. Therefore, it would be about a 15-minute walk back into town before she could reach the guild. Moreover, due to the fact that Wendy was afraid of accidentally crushing Natsu under her foot, she moved slower than normal and more carefully as well. Thereby increasing the length of her journey to the guild.

Although not vocal about it, Wendy actually loved to feel Natsu's tiny body under her foot. Every time his body squirmed under her sole it brought Wendy a lot of pleasure. Deep down, she whispered "Yes ... go on, Natsu! Don't stop!" ... although she quickly scolded herself for such thoughts because Natsu was her friend.

"No! He shouldn't move under my foot in order for me to be pleased! It gives me a sign that he is still alive! Yes!" Wendy thought, justifying her selfless thoughts.

Sometime later, the little dragon slayer enters in the guild with an even smaller dragon slayer still in hiding. As always, there was a lot of people around and it was very noisy.

Wendy was looking for the smartest woman in the guild - Levy. But of all her close friends, only Erza was here.

"Hi, Wendy! Have you already returned from your training duel? Where is Natsu?" Erza asked after noticing that Wendy came back alone. Wendy was glad she had met Ezra and could ask her for help.

"He is right here-owwwww!" Wendy screams when she felt something bite her foot. It was Natsu, he reminded Wendy that he wouldn't like for Erza to see him at such a small size. He had to bite Wendy's sole because inside her sock was too wet for him to use his magic. Her sweat was actually strong enough to extinguish his flames.

"Wendy?" Erza asked, looked questioningly at the girl.

"After our duel, he decided to swim in the river....hehehe" Quickly spoke Wendy hopping on one foot and holding the other foot that Natsu bit.

"He is swimming in the river? here?" Erza interrupted, finding wendy's behavior a bit strange.

"More importantly, he left a weak little girl alone! He is so irresponsible!" said Erza shaking her head.

'I'm not a little girl! And I'm not weak! In fact, I defeated Natsu! He is right there! Helpless, under my foot! But I can't tell you this now...' With a little anger mused Wendy. Unable to vocalize her thoughts.

"Ah yes, Erza-san, do you know where Levy is?" asked Wendy, able to stand on both her feet again.

"As always she's reading books in the library. Okay, Wendy, I have to go on a mission! bye!" Erza said, leaving the guild hall in a hurry.

Wendy waved her hand to Erza and went downstairs to the library on the second sublevel. On the first table at the entrance, there was a girl with magic glasses for quick reading. On the table, there were many different books, that the girl was going to read or had already read. It was Levy Mcgarden.

"Hi Wendy," Levy said without interrupting her reading session.

"Hi Levy....sorry I need your help!" Wendy blurted out.

"Sure...what is it," said Levi cheerfully, putting the book down on the table.

Wendy retold everything that happened half an hour ago. Although she was ashamed to say that Natsu was inside her sock, so Wendy kept silent about this fact. After a couple of minutes of silence, Levy finally spoke.

"It sounds unusual! Your magic is air but for some reason it allows you to shrink people. By the way, where is Natsu?" Levy asked, not seeing him in either Wendy's hand or on her shoulder.

"Well...he is....inside my sock...I...I don't have any pockets and I had to hide Natsu somewhere...so...it was the first place that came to my mind" - Said Wendy slowly and uncertainly, blushing like a tomato.

"I will get him out," The little girl said and sat down on the chair. She took off her shoe and then her knee sock. But somehow, Natsu was not there.

"What! Natsu-san? Natsu-san! Where are you! Natsu!" Wendy fell to her knees and looked into her shoe, then turned her sock inside out, but Natsu wasn't there.

The dragon slayers began to panic, various terrible thoughts visited her head: 'What if he fell out of my sock! And what if he got lost in the grass! But something bit my foot! But...'

Levy, who remained calm, wanted to go up to her friend and console her, but suddenly noticed something small and pink stuck to Wendy's sole.

"Wendy, what is on your foot?" asked Levy, pointing to the pink dot.

"What!?" without getting up from her knees, Wendy turned and saw a tiny dot on her sole ... it was Natsu.

"I....told ...you...it was...b...bad idea...!" Natsu croaked ... he was tired but everything was fine with him, not counting his height of course. Levy and Wendy looked at each other and then started laughing loudly.

"Hey! W...What's so funny!" Natsu was indignant. He was already able to speak normally but still couldn't unstick himself from Wendy’s sole.

"Hahahaha, Sorry...Natsu...we can't do anything about it" Levy said clutching at the belly.

After some time, the girls stopped laughing. Wendy unsticks Natsu from her sole and put him on top of the table, at which time Levy brought many heavy books and placed them next to Natsu; for him, they looked like tall mountains. Both girls sit at the table.

"2 and a half centimeters...hmmm," Said Levy measuring Natsu's height and writing all data in a notebook.

Closing the notebook Levy gave a speech in a monotonous voice: "After an hour of research, I have good news and bad news. The good news is that according to the results of the research, I came to the conclusion that Natsu will become normal again." Natsu and Wendy smiled broadly "But...but the bad news is that we can't determine for sure when Natsu will grow back!"

After a few seconds, Natsu spoke first: "What do you mean we can't!"

After clearing the dungeon on the floor 68 with the Assault Team Kirito decided to take a break from the front lines for the day, in order to dedicate his day to grinding EXP on floor 55 which had one of the best known dungeons for the higher level players to improve their sword skills.

He'd already been there for about 5 hours defeating monster after monster until he gained enough EXP to power himself up from level 78 to level 79. It was at that point in time where a rather unusual phenomena occurred, the last creature he defeated drops an item marked as *ultra rare*. It's inventory name was listed as a "Magnitude Crystal" something he'd never seen before on the info brokers item list. Great, first he received a unique sword skill with Dual Wielding and now a unique item as well. At least he could appraise this one and sell it later on if he had no use for it.

He opened his inventory and the orange crystal block materialized in his hand, unfortunately what Kirito failed to realized was that this particular item had a self activation feature that was triggered by the surrounding air. A glowing orange light expanded into a sphere around him, starting at his left hand and growing until it covered his entire body and part of the area around him. It was so blinding and brilliant that he was forced to cover his eyes until it began to dissipate.

It wasn’t a long period of time, maybe five or six seconds at most. But in that time Kirito’s life would be changed forever, or at least until they defeated Sword Art Online. “What was that? Some kind of in game flash grenade?” Kirito asked, still unaware of what had just happened to him. Although as he unshielded his eyes the truth quickly became apparent to him. Everything on the trail surrounding him was gigantic by comparison, the trees, the flowers, even the grass was taller than him now. The famed Black Swordsman had been reduced to the size of a bug inside the world of SAO.

This wasn’t good, at this size there was no way he could fight against the enormous monsters inside this virtual world. He’d have a hard enough time trying to slay a virtual bee, little own a floor boss. Hell, normal players would even be too much for him to handle in his current state. Even the weakest ones still left behind in the town of beginnings would be able to take on the so called strongest player in the game and win with relative ease.

Just then someone arrived through the warp gate via teleport crystal, sending them directly to Kirito’s location. Something that could only be done by someone he had added to his friends list, he imagined himself facing down a towering 300 foot tall Asuna. However instead the short and sweet Silica appeared a few feet away from him. Though she didn’t appear to be quite as short as he’s remembered her to be, in fact she appeared to be rather gigantic by comparison given his new size.

She was still wearing the same outfit Kirito had given her during their quest together, a pair of asymmetrically shoes, long black socks that ended halfway up her thighs, along with a red skirt and robe. From his position on the floor in front of her Kirito could even vaguely see her panties, barely covered by her skirt. Not that she made an effort to hide them from the eyes of bugs. They were plain white, with a red trim going around her waist. The same style she usually wore in the past.

Her eyes scanned the nearby area for any sign of Kirito but saw nothing, he was still on the map so it’s doubtful his HP dropped to zero. “That’s odd, it says here I should be standing directly on top of him.” Silica said to herself walking towards Kirito, one misstep away from literally standing on top of him. Kirito took actions to evade Silica’s falling foot as it stomped onto the ground where he’d been standing. If he'd moved even a second later he would've been as good as dead, Silica really had to watch where she was going.

"That's odd?" Silica said to herself, looking up to make sure Kirito wasn't in a tree above her. "Maybe it's some kind of bug?" she thought out loud, f course she meant it in a different context but it didn't stp Kirito from feeling any smaller. The young girl then turned her attention downwards in sadness, how was she supposed to find Kirito now? She just wanted to talk to him, with no other reason for her to seek him out.

It wasn't long before she noticed a tiny bug at her feet, waving up at her. It was something that stuck her as off, the bugs in SAO were familiars similar to NPC's they always behaved in a certain way, so it was weird that this one was acting different. "Wait, is that...?" She said putting her map data together with the appearance of this little black bug.

"Kirito!" She yelled, immediately covering her nether regions, not wanting to expose Kirito to what was under her skirt any more that she probably already had. "This is so embarrassing, how much did he see?" she asked herself, still she couldn't just leave him on the floor too be stepped on by another player or killed by some monster.

Kirito watched as Silica covered herself, glad that she had noticed him as a person rather than a bug that got too close to her giant feet. Hopefully now she just didn't think he was being a pervert trying to see up her skirt, only time would tell as she got down on one knee to pick Kirito up, moving one hand away from her crotch to pick him up. Effortlessly pinching him between her thumb and pointer finger and lifting him into the air.

"Is that really you Kirito?" she asked, bringing him under her face. To think of all people a thirteen year old girl would be his savior. He gave a nod as his response and yelled up to Silica for her assistance, she needed to get him to a safe zone and fast. He explained everything to Silica, the weird item in his inventory, him shrinking and the massive danger he was in so long as he was so tiny. At least in the safe zone his HP bar couldn't go down, even if he was stepped on he could survive.

Silica agreed to help her friend, but was still worried about his safety until she could get him there. "I'll bring you back to my place on floor 39, but there's something I have to do first..." Silica blushed, realizing something she'd have to do to ensure Kirito's wellbeing till she got home. "..I need to hide you inside of my clothes!" Silica blurted out, she knew it wouldn't be ideal for Kirito to get too close to certain parts of her body at his size, and this wasn't exactly hope she imagined it happening herself but if she were attacked then she couldn't fight back because one hand would be holding Kirito. Another reason for her decision was that she couldn't allow other players to see him as that might spread panic about other players shrinking.

Kirito was no idiot, he saw the logic in what Silica was thinking. Yet still he knew there was no other way. "Okay, do what you have to. I trust you completely." Kirito said as confidently as he possibly could given the situation, trying his best to help put Silica at ease. But in truth it only made her more embarrassed, where did Kirito think she was going to put him? Was he expecting to be dropped down her panties? Her mind beginning to swell with lewd thoughts about her shrunken friend's situation. Silica hadn't actually given any thought to where in her clothes she should keep him, she didn't expect him to say yes so quickly. She could drop him inside one of her shoes, easily enough to put on and take off. She could even dematerialize them when she got home. Aside from that there was too other options, her bra and her panties.

She was worried that his health might fall too fast in her shoes and he could be killed after experiencing her full weight. The other two options were much safer but also so embarrassing for her. Finally she had to make a decision.Kirito was to small to fight back anyways as she shoved him inside of her _________."

1. Shoe, Silica takes the modest route and teleports home shortly after, being careful not to step on Kirito too hard until she's in the safe zone. However afterwards she begins to apply more and more pressure until she's able to walk normally. Stomping on Kirito over and over again until she gets home.

2. Panties, Silica opens her panties below Kirito preparing herself for what came next. However before Kirito can object he finds himself tossed inside her underwear for safe keeping. unable to be seen by anyone. Still he tries to fight back as Silica walks home, causing her to get aroused by the time she finally makes it to her apartment.

3. Bra, Silica opens her bra and pushes Kirito on top of her breast, finding the spunk to tease him about this before closing her bra over him. However in this choice she decides to seek help from someone else. Bringing Kirito straight to Lisbeth and Asuna and telling them everything that happened. Now Kirito is in big trouble.
1531.title: Help From Silica

1532.content:
Kirito woke up, rubbing his head as he rolled over on top of a large flat surface, the last thing he remembered was falling through a trapdoor on the 72nd floor while grinding to level up. Safe to say he passed out somewhere between then, but where was he now? The surrounding area was much too bright to be part of a dungeon.

But when he stood up, Kirito realized the truth of his situation. He had left the dungeon behind and was now inside the home of another player. Only now, for some reason, he was the size of a fly! Even more shocking was the fact that he recognized this house, it belonged to Asuna, but why would he be teleported into her home? Could it have something to do with her forcing him to join a party with her the other night?

Before the high-level player could make sense of his situation, his head turned to the familiar sound of a closing door, eyes wide at the sight of Asuna herself as she casually strolled into the living room. The second in command of the Knights of The Blood Oath wearing her usual outfit, the white and red uniform leaving little to the imagination.

Kirito jumped up and down, trying to get her attention. The black swordsman called her name over and over again, but it was little use. He was too small to be heard and even harder to see dressed in all black. He might as well have been a piece of lint on her chair.

Finally, Asuna stopped in front of the chair, looking around the room after swearing she heard something, but brushed it off since nobody could enter her place without her permission. A gentle breeze blew her skirt up just enough to reveal her white panties to Kirito, laced with red fabric to match the rest of her attire. Kirito blushed and tried to avert his eyes, which would soon prove to be a near-fatal mistake.

In the blink of an eye, Asuna turned around in a manner befitting her nickname of "Lightning Flash" catching Kirito off guard as her panty clad ass hung in the air over the shrunken boy. The fabric of her underwear hugging her ass tightly, absorbed by her buttcrack as she leaned back, there was no time to react. Kirito fell onto his back, helpless to stop what came next.

*Boing*

Asuna bounced gracefully on top of the sofa cushion. At least that's how any normal-sized person would have seen it. For Kirito, it was a much different experience, akin to being hit by a falling meteorite made of cotton candy. Tonnes of soft flesh directly contradicting the immense weight her body put on the shrunken player. It didn't hurt either, especially when compared to being stabbed in this crazy game. However, he couldn't move a muscle, immobilized completely by Asuna's ass.

Slowly she ground her ass in a downward spiral, twisting her fanny from left to right in an attempt to become comfortable. Turning Kirito into an unwilling cushion for her behind, burying him under her panty clad ass. He winced in discomfort as he was pulled around in multiple directions, the virtual booty of his crush dominating his entire world.

What happens next?

1. Asuna feels a little prick on one of her buttcheeks, standing up to examine her seat only to find it empty and with Kirito stuck to her asscheek.

2. Kirito fights back the only way he can, biting Asuna to force a reaction and speed up the clock on being found, but will Asuna understand or even believe the reason he's shrunk.

3. Kirito gets dragged under Asuna as she scoots back in her seat, finding himself trapped under her panty covered crotch.
1532.title: Asuna's Tiny (Butt)Crush
