1551.title: No! Not My Cabbages!

15511.content:
Aang froze as he saw Toph standing high above him. He had been attempting to get into the Avatar state, and it had...backfired. Horribly. Now he was the size of a bug in front of the now-gargantuan blind girl. She took a few booming steps in Aang's general direction, and he tried to avoid looking at her massive feet and imagining what they would do to him if he wasn't fast enough.

He wouldn't have to imagine for long.

Toph's foot came crashing down a few more times, then suddenly stopped when she was right over him. The Avatar looked up at her glassy, unseeing eyes, and saw that they were looking directly at him. A puzzled frown formed on her face. "Twinkle Toes, is that you?"

Her foot lifted off the ground, and slowly glided over Aang. The last Airbender was mesmerized by its size -- he craned his head back, following the path of Toph's toes as they swept above him, until he lost his balance and fell on his back into the packed earth below. The young Earthbender's foot kept moving until her sole hovered above the spot where Aang was.

"Hold still, pipsqueak," she said. "I want to get a good look at you."

Then her foot stomped into the ground.

The Avatar was caught unprepared, and he was rammed head first even deeper into the dirt by Toph's sole. What little room he had to breathe in was polluted by the stench of her foot, and it was hard enough not to suffocate, let alone for him to Airbend his way out of the situation. Aang started to suck in air through his mouth -- it did little to dilute the horrible smell, but it was a start. Then Toph mashed her foot backwards, and Aang was given no time to react before he found his open mouth pressed against her sole. In an instant, he could taste it all -- all the accumulated grime and sweat caked onto the bottom of Toph's foot -- and he desperately began to bang on the thick skin of the blind girl's sole.

Toph retracted her foot, and Aang gratefully swallowed lungfuls of fresh air as he pulled himself up to a standing position.

"So it is you, huh, Twinkle Toes?" she said. "I dunno how you got this way, but it sure is perfect for our training."

With that, she stomped the ground. The earth started to shake and rumble. Aang looked around, and saw a huge wall of soil and rock rising up to form a ring around them. He looked back at Toph. She was smiling.

"We'll start off with some Airbending exercises to warm you up." Just as Aang breathed a sigh of relief, the gigantic blind girl slammed her foot right next to him. "Try and dodge my feet, pipsqueak. Trust me, you don't wanna be caught under them when I'm through with you, because then things are gonna get a whole lot worse."

Aang backed away a few steps, then made an air scooter and leapt on it. Toph raised her foot right above where the Avatar was and slammed down. But Aang had darted away, just out of her reach. She raised her foot and stomped the ground again... but by now Aang was racing circles around her in the ring, zipping between her legs, across her feet, and over her sanded-down and scratched-up toenails.

Then Toph went on the offensive, lumbering around the ring but routinely failing to squish the bug-sized Airbender. Aang, on the other hand, couldn't escape the arena -- he would have to move in a straight line for long enough that the giantess would surely catch him -- but he knew that all he had to do was outlast her. Unfortunately, at his tiny size, Aang would tire much faster than his much larger trainer.

And Toph had a trick up her sleeve.

Once more, the young Earthbender raised her foot and stomped the ground, and Aang zipped away to safety... or so he thought. He was so focused on not getting caught beneath Toph's foot that he backed away without looking and slammed into a newly-created wall of rock. As he slid to the ground, temporarily stunned, Toph took the initiative and moved her foot over to him. When she finally brought her weight down on him, it was not with enough force to break his tiny body, but the crushing pain on his chest jarred Aang to his senses.

His head was stuck between her toes, but the rest of his body was pinned under her gargantuan foot. Toph was very carefully not applying enough pressure to pop him like an insect, but the sheer force at work made even the simple act of breathing an agonizing endeavor. And the horrible stench was just as bad between her toes as it was beneath her sole -- Aang couldn't take it much longer. He tried to squirm, but there was no space for him to use as leverage.

Suddenly, Toph leaned over him, more likely to show off the wide smile on her now-enormous face than any other reason. "Well then, Twinkle Toes, it looks like you've failed at basic training. I guess I'll need to toughen you up if you have any hope of becoming an Earthbender like me... but lucky you, I know the best place to get some endurance training."

Toph then went back to standing straight, thankfully relieving some of the weight on Aang's body as she did so, and for a while he could only hear his captress as she muttered under her breath and as something moved against the fabric that she was wearing. Then something monumental in size landed next to her foot with a heavy THUNK! Aang struggled to look behind him, but he was still pinned and could only make out a vast dark band. Then the hand of the blind girl reached down and plucked the Avatar from between her toes, her fingers curling into a fist around his puny torso as she effortlessly lifted him into the air. As he sped upwards, he managed to get a glimpse at what had dropped next to him.

It was Toph's belt.

Aang would have little time to wonder at what she had planned for him, though, as she quickly maneuvered him to her backside and the meaning became obvious. With her free hand, she pulled up the the light strip of cloth hanging behind her to reveal her green pants. Toph then leaned forward and jutted her rear in the unfortunate Avatar's direction. Her ass was titanic, large enough that there was a tight round outline of either buttock on her otherwise very loose pants. Aang gulped. Toph's foot was already so large that when it was flat on the dirt, the Avatar was only about half as tall as the distance between the ground and the pinky toenail -- and even just one of her butt cheeks seemed at least twice as large as her foot. "Ready for your endurance training, Twinkle Toes?"

Before Aang could respond, she hooked open her pants and panties with her free thumb and chucked him into the waiting chasm of her butt crack. The last Airbender rolled down between the two massive orbs of flesh as they came closer together, eventually bringing his slide to a neat, if embarrassing, stop.

Toph withdrew her hand and let her panties settle back snugly against her rear as Aang desperately tried to clamber out of her crack, to no avail. Her muscles held his left leg in a vice-like grip just above the knee, which prevented him from either climbing out or bending his way out. He was stuck, so he tried the only method left open to him...

Pleading.

The Avatar started banging on the unyielding, massive walls of Toph's butt, yelling, "Toph! Toph! Let me out! Please!"

He would have kept going, but suddenly her ass contracted, slamming him between her twin cheeks and muffling his cries still further as Toph bent over to pick up her belt and refastened it, then grabbed something else...

Aang couldn't see the smile on the blind girl's face, but he heard her gloating. "Hey, Twinkle Toes, guess what I got -- a new nutcracker!" She gave a few experimental swishes with Aang's abandoned, normal-sized staff, and almost immediately felt the tingling sensation of her tiny captive shouting and trying to get free again. Toph straightened up, relaxing her rear muscles just enough to hear a tiny voice screaming ".-n antique! Let-"

Then she quickly clenched her ass again, and the voice went silent, but the squirming picked back up. Toph grinned. She was definitely going to have fun with this, but first she had to get back to camp. So the young Earthbender started walking back, while the unfortunate Avatar was being tossed back and forth between her powerful glutes, occasionally getting squished when she paused to squeeze them together.

Finally, after a long walk, Toph made it back to the camp. She walked over to her tent and tossed Aang's staff unceremoniously over her sleeping bag, out of sight from the rest of the camp. Then she walked over to the campfire and leaned over, causing her buttocks to spread wide. Aang, unprepared for his prison to open so suddenly, dropped like stone out of Toph's butt. He landed on the soft fabric of her panties, and came tumbling to a stop beneath her right butt cheek.

At that moment, the giantess sat down, and Aang was flung against her rear by the momentum, until finally she landed with a powerful WHUMP! As the blind girl reclined, Aang squirmed. An avalanche of assflesh barreled over him and settled above, giving him enough room to breathe but trapping him for the third time since he'd shrunk. Only the wider area stopped his friend's weight from pulverizing him.

Suddenly, someone else came into the camp; Katara. "Alright, as soon as the boys get back we can eat. Toph, have you seen Aang anywhere?"

Underneath her, the Avatar started squirming, but Toph just shifted her weight back a bit and clenched her cheeks, effectively silencing him. "I did, but he said he's going to fly ahead to scout the area. He said we'll meet him again in a few days."

Katara paused. "Hmm... I hope he'll be alright."

Toph silently sighed in relief. "Yeah, me too."

Then she had an idea. She slowly reached into her ass and fished out Aang, muffling him with her fist as she looked around. What to do with the pipsqueak?

1. She tosses him into her mouth for "waterbending".

2. She throws him down Katara's bra when she's not looking.

3. She decides Aang will be staying in her ass for the rest of the day and night.
15511.title: Towering Toph's Tough Love

15512.content:
Aang and Sokka were goofing around at the local watering hole, a small lake overseen by a large waterfall. The two were seeking some well-earned relaxation, as well as a distraction from the war with the Fire Nation. However, things were rarely so simple for Team Avatar.

Sokka was already in the water, doing a leisurely backstroke while humming a song sung by his people in the Southern Water Tribe. Meanwhile, an energetic Aang sought fun and entertainment by running vertically up the mountain alongside the waterfall with the use of Airbending.

"Look out below!" The bald monk yelled, jumping high up and doing several flips before falling towards the lake. Bracing himself in the form of a cannonball for impact, Aang tried to cause a big splash. Sokka noticed this very late, frantically paddling out of the way moments before impact.

"Jeez Aang, give a guy some warning next time would you!" Sokka called out, before realizing that Aang had yet to surface. Looking down, he noticed his friend close to the bottom of the lake, seemingly trapped with his leg caught between some rocks.

However, before Sokka could swim down to save him, Aang's tattoos began to glow ominously, and suddenly the whole lake was enveloped in bright light. An odd shiver worked it's way up Sokka's spine, catching the warrior off-guard as something strange began to happen.

Five minutes passed before Katara arrived at the side of the lake, hoping to join the boys and maybe practice her Waterbending a little. Only when she got there, it appeared deserted.

"Aang, Aang? Where are you?"Sokka yelled, so focused on searching for his friend that he failed to notice the change in his surroundings.

"Sokka, I'm all right. I'm over here." Aang replied, announcing his location after rising back to the surface. The two swimming towards the shore to catch their breath, when something odd happened.

"Sokka, Aang? Are you out here?" Katara asked, her voice so loud that it resounded in their eardrums, almost like she had screamed directly into their ears.

"Jeez! Katara you don't have to yell! We're right, here." Sokka paused for a moment, before turning around to see a three-hundred-foot tall version of his sister standing at the edge of the lake.

https://www.deviantart.com/art/Katara-s-...

She was wearing her usual swimsuit, made up of primarily white cloth that contrasted her brown skin. The titanic-sized Waterbender failed to notice the two inch-tall boys floating on the water's surface only a few feet away.

Katara heard no response and figured the two must have gone off to collect firewood and berries or had taken a separate path back to their campsite. She certainly never would have guessed that they were swimming around directly in front of her, at the size of bugs no less.

The scene before her eyes was so serene and peaceful, a lake full of sparkling clear water, and even a waterfall for her to practice her skills. She couldn't pass up such a perfect opportunity, breaking into a basic Waterbending stance.

Waves appeared at first around Aang and Sokka, alerting them to what was about to happen. "Aang move!" Sokka warned, not wanting to get caught in his sibling's Waterbending stream. But, it was too late, Katara lifted them both into the air inside a bubble of water.

"Sokka, hold on!" Aang yelled, instinctively putting his Waterbending skills to use as well. Unfortunately, the pull of Katara's strength was too strong for Aang to fight completely. The bald monk falling back towards the lake below while Sokka was left behind at Katara's mercy.

Sokka watched in horror as Aang feel to safety without him, landing with a splash before disappearing underneath the surface. Meanwhile, Katara began her practice session, bending the water into the form of a river and moving the stream towards herself.

For Sokka, this experience was similar to riding down a water slide at over sixty miles per hour. The rushing waters traveling down around Katara's waist and behind her butt, giving Sokka a mountainside view of gigantic cheeks before traveling down her thigh. Continuing down to her knees, Sokka made a futile effort to fight the current completely under Katara's control.

However, that didn't even slow Katara down as she failed to notice the pebble-sized boy's movements. Sending the water further down her body, around her other knee and down to his sister's feet. While Aang watched from the lake, unable to believe how beautiful she looked, like a giant goddess.

Helpless to stop her Aang called out the giantess Waterbender's name over and over again, using his Airbending abilities to raise his voice higher and higher with each failed attempt. "Katara, KAtara, KATara, KATAra, KATARa, KATARAAAAA!" he yelled, but she was too focused on her training to hear his squeaks for help.

Nothing could break her intensive focus. Meanwhile, Sokka was assaulted by wave after wave of recycled water as he tried to escape the stream, trying to catch his breath rather than yell out for help so he wouldn't drown.

Luckily, Katara hadn't planned on practicing for long. It was more of a habit she developed over the past few months to always bend water whenever she was near any lake or river. It helped to bolster her skills and make her a more powerful bender. But she still came to the lake for a reason, what will she do next?

1. Katara uses the water Sokka's trapped in to was her feet, dragging the tiny boy along the underside of her foot before inadvertently trapping him between her toes. Forcing Aang to chase after her as she walks back to camp.

2. Katara tosses the water back into the lake and takes a few steps back, preparing a monstrous cannonball that comes too close for comfort for both Aang and Sokka, either landing on them or endangering them by creating a massive tidal wave.
15512.title: Katara's Arrival

1552.content:
Welcome to the roaring twenties world of The Legend of Korra, where the citizens of Republic City drive Satomobiles and watch Pro Bending matches. Where the newest Avatar Korra battles Psychic Waterbenders and grows into a blue giant to battle ancient evil spirits. After so many big adventures one of the character from this cast will shrink and embark on their own adventure, literally bigger than anything they've encountered in the past because they'll be a lot smaller. Now which character will shrink, choose by clicking on one of these scenarios.

1. Mako wakes up to find himself sitting in the driver's seat of Asami's personal Satomobile. Only one problem, he's an inch tall and today's Asami's supposed to be hanging out with Korra.

2. Mako and Bolin end up shrinking inside of their locker room moments before Korra arrives for their exhibition match up against the Buzzard Wasps, they find themself on a bench and are knocked into Korra's team uniform boots as she sits down. With nobody to aid her Korra agrees to a 1 on 3 match, unaware that her teammates are under her soles.

Now if these options don't catch your interest there will certainly be more to come, of course you could always add those options yourself in 'More Choices' listed below.
1552.title: Shrinking In Republic City

15523.content:
Maybe people would appreciate some scenarios in which Tenzin shrinks? Yes/No/Maybe So? If not then click the 'More Choices' option at the bottom of the page.

For now let's lay out the options and see which one you might like best.

1. Korra Shrinks Tenzin in order to punish him for always being such a stick in the mud by tricking his giant daughters into torturing him under the lie that she was helping Tenzin with training.

2. While attempting to meditate into the spirit world Tenzin mysteriously shrinks down to an inch tall, moment's later Ikki arrives to start her own training for the day. Starting off with meditation.
15523.title: Shrinking on Air Temple Island

155231.content:
"Korra, have you gone insane! You can't just go around shrinking people! You have to bring me to Kya so she can reverse this!" Tenzin begged, not wanting to spend another minute alone with the giant Avatar now that she'd cut him down to size.

"Oh I'll bring you to someone alright. But not to Kya. I think it'd be more fun to introduce you to Jinora and Ikki. I bet they'd have some fun with you at this size." Korra said with a smile.

"Fine! But they won't go along with whatever you have planned. They'll help me!" Tenzin exclaimed, hoping his faith in his daughters was not misplaced.

"Not when I explain to them that you agreed to be shrunken down in order to be trained by me they won't." Korra replied. "And if you try to tell them the truth, you'll find yourself between my buttcheeks before you even get a chance to blink. And if that happens, you won't be getting out for a long time. I might even try keeping you back there for a few pro-bending matches."

Tenzin gulped at Korra's threat, not wanting to find out if she was bluffing. He had a sinking feeling in his stomach that she would take the opportunity to put him between her cheeks if he gave her the slightest excuse to do so.

Korra could tell from Tenzin's silence that he was going to go along with her demands. Smiling at her domination over the tiny airbender, Korra strode out of her bedroom with Tenzin in hand, headed for the room shard by Jinora and Ikki as she worked out a plan to make sure that Tenzin had a lot of "fun" with them. Fortunately, both Jinora and Ikki were already in the room when she entered.

"Hey girls, I've got something to show you." Korra said, itching to reveal her shrunken toy.

"What is it Korra?" Jinora asked, standing up and walking towards the dark skinned girl. Ikki followed close behind, equally excited.

"Is that dad? How'd he get so tiny?" Ikki asked, as she saw her shrunken father in the Avatar's hand, her eyes wide with wonder at the sight of the shrunken monk. Jinora looked equally surprised, but not in an excited way the way Ikki did.

"Yep! Your dad shrunk himself with some spirit world magic as part of a new training routine. He has to avoid getting stomped on by my giant feet while I try to pin him. It's all about dodging and moving quickly. Improving agility and stuff." Korra explained to the enraptured Airbender girl, still unable to take her eyes off her shrunken father. Ikki was buying every word Korra was saying, but Jinora on the other hand looked skeptical.

"Is this true Dad? You really shrunk yourself to get stomped on? Is that safe?" Jinora asked.

Tenzin considered telling Jinora the truth, but did not dare risk Korra's wrath. He could almost feel the young Avatar's muscular glutes squeezing around his body, and couldn't imagine what it'd be like during one of Korra's matches. "Yes Jinora. It's a little, err... unconventional, but we have to be willing to try new things to prepare to face the next threat when the day finally comes." Tenzin replied.

"Anyway, Tenzin actually did pretty well dodging my feet earlier. But we figured that to really test his speed, he'd need a master airbender to try to pin him. Someone smaller and quicker than me...."

"Ooo! Ooo! Pick me! I'll do it! My feet are the perfect size!" Ikki said, jumping herself up onto an air scooter so she could show her bare feet to Korra and her father. It was clear she had not been wearing shoes all day, as her soles were littered with dirt and crumbs from around the house.

"What a great idea Ikki! Can't believe I didn't think of it." Korra exclaimed, loving how easy it was to manipulate the young girl. "The training itself is pretty simple. All you have to do is catch your dad under your foot. If you pin him three times in the next five minutes, then we know he needs more work on this." Korra explained, placing the tiny man down on the floor.

From his position on the floor, Tenzin could truly appreciate the massive scale of his daughter. The young airbender who usually only came up to his hip, but now he was only standing at the height of her big toe. It and its 9 comrades stood before him menacingly, bouncing and wiggling with excitement as Ikki anxiously awaited the beginning of the game. Looking up the hundred or so feet to her innocently smiling face, Tenzin realized he couldn't blame his daughter for what was about to happen. It was clear that all she wanted to do was help. Her only mistake was trusting Korra, something he'd made the mistake of doing as well.

"Ready daddy?" Ikki asked, itching to begin.

Tenzin took one last look up at Korra, hoping she would show mercy and spare him from this. The dark skinned water bender simply smiled and winked, making it clear she would not help him. Behind her, Jinora was watching with some combination of anxiety and anticipation. It seemed she still wasn't convinced this was a good idea, but she also seemed interested in seeing how it went down. Either way, she had no intention of interrupting what Korra and Ikki were planning. Not wanting to risk the hellish punishment Korra had threatened him with, Tenzin gulped and turned back to face his younger daughter. "Ready." He said, gritting his teeth and preparing to move.

Without a second's hesitation Ikki had literally leapt into action, her bare sole on a beeline for Tenzin as she quickly descended from above. Thinking quickly, Tenzin hopped onto an air scooter and started charging away, hoping he was a small enough target at his new size to keep his daughter on her toes. As he sped across the room, he couldn't help but stay focused on the giant girl behind him, always looking over his shoulder to keep track of his giantess daughter's ever approaching feet. Unfortunately, he spent so much time looking over his shoulder that he failed to notice he had sped his air scooter into the corner of the room. He stopped just short of crashing head on into the wall, hopping off his scooter and putting his back to the wall, leaving him cornered before Ikki's gigantic feet.

"Looks like you're trapped daddy. Hope my feet don't smell too bad." Ikki said with a giggle, preparing to stomp her father into the hard wood floor of her room. Meanwhile, Tenzin was looking for a way out. He figured if he moved fast enough, he might be able to leap past her and get some space between them once again. Not having any time to waste as Ikki began to lift her foot, Tenzin picked a spot between his daughter's pillar like legs and took an air bending propelled leap, hoping to come out safely on the other side of the human arch. Ikki had other plans. With impressive speed, the young girl swung her foot into the leaping Tenzin's path, displaying her bare sole to the master airbender as he hurtled directly into it.

Tenzin had no time to react as his daughter's sole swung into his path. Before he could begin to think of another path, he'd slammed head on into the soft underside of her foot, inadvertently burying his face in the soft skin of her foot just in time for her to slam it back down to the floor, pinning him.

As Tenzin lay in smothering darkness beneath his daughter's foot, he swore that as soon as he grew back, he'd make his first priority ensuring Ikki bathed more frequently. The scent of her foot was worse than anything he'd ever experience in his life, and that was including the time he'd spent in Korra's ass earlier that day. He tried to struggle free from his position, but that only seemed to make Ikki press down harder on him.

"Stop moving so much dad! Your beard tickles!" Ikki said between giggles, twisting her foot on top of her father like she was grinding a bug out of existence. She was just being playful, but it certainly didn't feel that way for Tenzin. After a few seconds though, Ikki realized she still had two more stomps to get in and kicked her dad away, sending him sliding away from her feet across the slick wooden floor.

As soon as Tenzin caught his breath, he jumped right back onto his air scooter, resolving to learn from his last mistake. Now, he focused entirely on the terrain in front of him, ensuring he did not inadvertently corner himself once again. He weaved between and dodged under furniture in an attempt to always keep something between him and Ikki, hoping the obstructions would slow her down. Unfortunately, being under the couch just meant he lost track of his giantess daughter. He found her again before long. Just as he was about to pop out from under the couch, Ikki's barefoot swung into his path once more, this time toes first. The 8 year old girl effortlessly snagged her shrunken father off the floor between her massive first and second toe, wrapping him in a particularly unpleasant embrace. Tenzin tried to push himself free, but Ikki's toes clamped tightly around him, forcing all the air from his lungs in the process. As he gasped for air, he found his lungs filled with the unbearable stench radiating out from the crevice between his daughter's toes. As Tenzin struggled to stay conscious in spite of her feet, Ikki just laughed. "I guess you're my toe jam now huh dad?"

What happens?

1. Ikki pins Tenzin a third time, so Korra suggests Ikki keep her dad in her shoe for "endurance training".

2. Ikki narrowly misses pinning Tenzin underneath her toes a third time, annoying her as she wanted to feel her dad between her toes one more time. Korra then suggests that Tenzin build up his strength by massaging Jinora's feet.

3. Korra Intervenes telling Ikki she's too good at this game, stepping in herself to try and capture Tenzin underfoot in the final round.
155231.title: Daughters In Charge

choices: Spending the Day with Ikki's Butt
155232.content:
Tenzin's day started unremarkably. He woke up at dawn, far too early for his young children to bother with. He spent three hours in focused Airbending training, aware that it was one of the few times he could do so without interruption. When he finished, he headed into the meditation room, ready to relax his tired body and focus instead on sharpening his mind. He sat down on in the center of an orange meditation mat and prepared to focus.

Tenzin had been meditating for decades, ever since his father Avatar Aang taught him as a boy. But meditating into the Spirit World was still quite new to him. He had tried for years, but only recently accomplished with the help of his daughter Jinora. He could now do it without her, but it still wasn't easy, and he didn't always succeed.

He slowed his breathing and closed his eyes, allowing his mind to reach out towards the Spirit World. But this time, something was different. Rather than the usual warm feeling that slowly overtook his body when he entered the Spirit World, he instead encountered a sharp jolt, as though he was shocked by a lighting bender. His eyes snapped open as he reeled back from the shock, only to find the world around him looked very different now. Sure, it was the same meditation room he had started in, but everything was enormous! Whatever spiritual magic he had encountered, it had shrunken him down to no more than an inch tall. He inspected his body and found himself otherwise unharmed, though a quick attempt at Airbending showed him that his bending was somehow gone as well.

Before Tenzin could decide on the best course of action, he heard a noise next to him. Looking to his side, he saw that the glass of water he had brought into the room with him was shaking. Ripples that were now the size of waves to him blew across the water's surface in response to some distant vibration. Before long, Tenzin began to feel the ground shaking as well. This was accompanied by the rhythmic banging sound of footsteps approaching. He wondered who it could be. Korra usually meditates this time of day, and she might be able to help him with her connection to the spirit world. Jinora would also be of assistance. However, when the door to the meditation room finally opened, the source of the shaking was revealed as his daughter Ikki walked into the room. He never even considered the earthquakes he was feeling could be caused by someone as petite as his youngest daughter. Then again, the young girl was now as tall as the Avatar Aang statue in Republic City Bay. Shel was dressed in her typical orange and yellow robes, with no shoes to speak of.

"Hmm, I thought Jinora said dad was in here..." Ikki muttered. "Ah well, meditation will be easier without him constantly interrupting anyway," Ikki muttered, her eyes scanning the room.

Tenzin would normally have been annoyed that Ikki called his suggestions and lessons "interruptions", but this was no time for little annoyances like that. He had a giant daughter to deal with. He began to muse about how best to get her attention, stroking his beard furtively as he mused about his options. He looked back up at the giant Airbender, only to see her eyes now fixed on his position. He rejoiced internally, thinking she had spotted him. She had come in here looking for him after all. He watched as she strode towards him, evoking his memory of Korra's giant astral form fighting Unalaq as she approached, seeming taller and taller the closer she got. He jumped up and down and waved his arms, trying to get Ikki to bend down so she could hear him. He certainly found it strange that she had not said anything yet.

Of course, what Tenzin didn't realize is that his orange robes blended in quite well to the orange meditation mat he was currently occupying. Combined with his small size, this made him too small for his giant daughter to notice. So while she was looking down at her father, all she saw was a comfy looking mat to begin her meditation on.

This became clear to Tenzin when he saw Ikki turn around, replacing her view of his face with one of her butt, clad in the typical baggy yellow air bender pants her whole family wore. He reacted quickly, breaking out into a sprint away from his giantess daughter as he realized she saw him as little more than a seat. He looked over his shoulder to see that she had begun to squat, her giant butt hanging over the mat and covering him in its shadow like the moon eclipsing the sun.

Just as Tenzin thought he had escaped, he suddenly felt himself beginning to be pulled backward by a strong wind. He planted his feet and braced against this unexpected obstacle, not yet sure what he was facing. However, a strong gust at ground level swept his feet out from under him, sending him spiraling into the air.

Without even thinking anything of it, Ikki had subconsciously summoned a temporary air scooter to break her fall. She didn't wanna fall butt first on the ground without some air resistance, and these mediation cushions offered much less support than she would have liked. The air scooter lasted just long enough for her butt to be slowed down almost to a stop, then disappeared as quickly as it had arrived, allowing her butt to finish its descent.

For Tenzin, this quick air scooter had a much more unfortunate effect. He was pulled into its center as it formed, thrown around and twisted in the middle of it like he was trapped in a tremendous tornado. He knew the truth though. This was nothing more than a little air ball designed to slow his daughter's butt down. It wasn't enough to force to stop a small girl's butt, but it was more than enough to completely dominate him.

Suddenly though, the wind of Ikki's airball threw him in a new direction, and with all the grace of a fly smashing into the windshield of a Sato Mobile Tenzin face planted directly into Ikki's right butt cheek. The soft fabric of her Airbender attire as well as the squishiness of her butt cheek absorbed the collision, keeping Tenzin from splattering into a puddle against her cheek. Instead, he was sprawled out like a starfish, arms and legs spread as the jiggly round object he found himself attached to came crashing downward towards his inevitable demise.

THOOM

Ikki's butt touched down hard on the ground, slamming Tenzin back into the meditation cushion as she barreled down on top of him. His back hits the cushion and sinks into it, his weight augmented by the force of Ikki's descending cheek. The cushion can only sink so far though, and once he reaches its breaking point, the soft fabric pushes him back upwards, causing him to sink into his daughter's fleshy cheek.

Ikki had no notion of the drama going on beneath her. All she had done was sit on a perfectly normal cushion, just as she had done many times in the past and now she was ready to begin her meditation. She did briefly feel a slight bump under her right cheek, but as she settled into the cushion it mostly dissipated. She shook the thought out of her head, reminding herself not to get distracted with things around her, and to focus inward, just as Jinora and her father had taught her. She began to rhythmically inhale and exhale, focusing on her breathing and on staying calm. She closed her eyes and allowed her mind to drift towards the spiritual plane...

Tenzin now more than ever wished he had not taught his daughter so we'll to ignore earthly distraction. He screamed into and pounded against her butt, but the child's cheek easily absorbed the blows, and the giant girl above showed no sign of even noticing. She was completely still and unmoving as she meditated. Tenzin could have been stuck under some kind of fleshy boulder for all the difference it would make. He resolved to add a step to Ikko's meditation ritual once he was back to normal size: always check your seat for shrunken people. She adjusted slightly in her seat as she got comfortable, grinding her ass back and forth on the mat as she settled in. This had the unfortunate side effect of dragging Tenzin's face across her ass cheek, literally rubbing his face in the humiliation of being dominated by his daughter's backside.

When she finally settled into her routine, it was almost a relief for Tenzin. At the very least, the tremendous weight bearing down on him was uniform and constant. Of course, he still wanted nothing more than to be free of it. For the entirety of her 30-minute meditation session, he screamed, wriggled, and punched at her cheek, doing his best to get her to notice him. For Ikki, the rebellion of the world's greatest Airbender under her cheek did little more than cause a tiny itch on her butt, one that was too insignificant for her to notice as her mind wandered in meditation.


What happens?

1. Ikki finishes meditating and notices a frequent itch under her butt. She gets up to investigate and finds Tenzin.

2. Tenzin is left sprawled on the matt as Ikki stands up, just in time for Korra's meditation to begin on top of Tenzin.

3. Ikki finishes and stands up, still not noticing Tenzin stuck to the back of her pants by sweat after 30 minutes. Now he must try getting her attention while stuck to her butt.
155232.title: Meditation Under Ikki's Ass

1552321.content:
Nearly forty-five minutes had passed since Ikki entered her meditative state, not that Tenzin could gauge that from his current whereabouts under his daughter's butt. Still pinned firmly underneath her right butt cheek Tenzin tried everything he could to get her attention. But no matter how much he kicked, struggled, or screamed for help under Ikki's bottom the young girl remained stagnant.

"Ikki, get up this instant or your grounded!" Tenzin yelled, becoming increasingly frustrated. Unable to believe the situation he found himself in, his bones slowly beginning to crack under the immense weight of Ikki's hindquarters.

He began to count himself lucky that it was only Ikki who sat on him. Knowing that if it was Korra or Jinora who'd sat on him instead he might not have survived this long under their bigger butts. However, none of these thoughts made the circumstances more pleasant or less humiliating.

Tenzin completely realized that Ikki was unaware of the fact that he'd been shrunk, at the moment he was nothing more than some extra padding. Making her pillow only slightly more comfortable for her butt, luckily his suffering would not continue much longer as Ikki slowly opened her eyes.

"Ahh, meditation sure is boring!" Ikki's voice boomed as she lifted her arms over her head. Stretching her body as if she'd just awoken from a long nap, driving her butt hard onto the cushion below her. Subconsciously, she was trying to eliminate the source of an itch that had been bothering her body for some time now while her brain was on a spiritual journey.

Tenzin screamed for help as the weight of Ikki's butt on top of his body seemed to double in an instant, his voice silenced as all the air exited his lungs. Meanwhile, his limbs remained immobilized by the massive onslaught of loosely contained butt flesh. At this moment Ikki's conscious mind became aware of the itch plaguing her bottom.

"Huh, what that?" Ikki asked herself out loud. It almost felt like she was sitting on top of something(or someone).

Swatting her arms towards the ground, Ikki quickly created two gusts of wind the propelled her to her feet. Meanwhile, Tenzin was suddenly blinded by an intense light after being surrounded by darkness for over half an hour.

"Let's see." Ikki announced, turning to her attention to her former seat and bending down to get a closer look. Her eyes scanned every inch of the cushion for anything out of the ordinary but found nothing.

During this time Tenzin regained his sight, expecting to look up and once again see his giantess daughter. Instead, he found himself looking down from above bringing him to a shocking conclusion. After being sat on for an extended time, Tenzin's body was stuck to Ikki's pants by a combination of sweat and static cling.

"Ikki, down here!" Tenzin yelled, relieved to be breathing fresh air. Now all he had to do was get Ikki's attention so she could bring him to Korra or Jinora for help.

"Huh, what the...?" Ikki asked, trailing off as she looked up between her legs, pushing her butt upwards. She could have sworn she heard something, and strangely enough, the sound originated near her butt. She knew she didn't make the noise, but maybe she sat on something that did.

Reaching behind her without a precise location on her butt in mind Ikki tapped her hand against her rear end a few times before feeling something very tiny on her right cheek. Oddly enough it was smaller than her fingertips, and moving!

Ikki quickly peeled Tenzin from her backside, thinking she'd sat on a bug. It never even crossed her mind that she'd been sitting on another human being, little own her father. Although he didn't realize it a the time, Tenzin was very lucky. Most girls in Republic City would have panicked, knocking the assumed bug to the ground and squishing it for good measure. But Ikki, on the other hand, was intrigued to find out what kind of bug could survive being sat on for so long.

She brought Tenzin under her gaze, squinting to get a better look at this bug she'd captured. "Wait, Dad is that you?" she asked confused. What was he doing here and why was he so tiny? She asked herself, beginning to think that her extended period of meditation was messing with her head.

"Ikki, please I need your help. Bring me to Korra, or Jinora." Tenzin begged, the giant Airbender girl realizing that she wasn't hallucinating or seeing things at all.

"Wait, first off how did you manage to get so tiny?" Ikki asked, more interested in the method that Tenzin used to shrink himself down than bringing him to her sister or Korra.

"I'm not quite sure, to be honest. I was just here waiting for Korra to arrive before you got here, now please help me find her." Tenzin explained. It didn't matter much how he shrunk as long as he could reverse the effects.

However, Ikki's interpretation of the events played out differently than how they transpired in the real world. Rather than thinking of Tenzin's shrinking as an accidental occurrence, she believed that he did this to himself on purpose. But why?

(These three choices will play out it two separate forms of dialogue, labeled "1" and "2-3" below to mark the choices for the direction the story will take next.)

1. "You must have shrunk yourself in order to train and get much stronger, but you don't have to worry. We won't need Korra or Jinora's help because I've been practicing a lot and I've gotten very good. I can probably even beat you when you're this tiny." Ikki insists that Tenzin spares with her to see where he stand in his training, but without his Airbending, he doesn't have the tiniest chance against his giantess daughter.

2-3(Separate Dialogue). "I know what's going on here! You must have shrunk yourself because you wanted Korra to sit on you instead of me. You're such a pervert! You're lucky I'm not going to tell mom about this! Although, you will need to be punished..."

2. "I think Jinora's sandal could use a new insole, luckily for her you're the perfect little size to ride under her foot without being felt." Ikki sneaks into Jinora's room and finds her sandals in the corner, dropping Tenzin inside before running off. Without his Airbending, Tenzin is unable to escape and Jinora soon returns.

3. "Since you wanted to get under Korra's butt I'll let you, well see how much you enjoy yourself when I use one of Asami's adhesive patches to tie you down on her saddle. She should be going for a ride any minute now." Ikki makes a quick stop to the dining room on her way find Naga(Korra's Polar Bear Dog) grabbing the patch mentioned in the text to glue Tenzin to Korra's saddle. Just as she finishes Korra arrives and Ikki must make up a lie on the spot.
1552321.title: Ikki Finds Tenzin

choices: Old Enemy for a New Avatar
155233.content:
How about we get some older character from the show who were thought to have disappeared first Amon from the first season of LOK and Azula from the original Avatar series.

1. After being captured many years ago Azula was shrunken and frozen for her crimes against Aang and his team? She ends up being accidentally thawed out and introduced to Korra and company on Air Temple Island.

2. After disappearing the the incident where his brother Tarrlok blew up there boat Amon is carried to the shore of Air Temple Island where he quickly finds himself acquainted with the current Avatar, Korra.
155233.title: Blast From The Past

1552331.content:
Originally written by Mr. Phorcys (26)

A figure walked down the prison hall, flanked by guards. The Hundred Years War had ended. Peace had come to the land. But there were still remnants of the old Fire Nation. Prince Zuko -- no, now Fire Lord Zuko -- was bound to face challenges as he restructured his nation. The government in particular -- a century of conflict had bred a militant disposition in the elite. These people had flourished under Sozin, Azulon, Ozai. They would not budge for an exiled prince, a traitor, a teenager disowned and scarred by his father. Not while there was another option.

The prison was in the capital. Nowhere else, not even Boiling Rock, could be trusted with this prisoner. She was the reason for numerous attempted break-ins, and had nearly started civil wars several times over her claim. Azula. It didn't matter that her brief reign displayed paranoia and megalomania on a scale grander than even her father. She represented the Old Ways, and at the present she was a liability. Irredeemable, vengeful, unstable... and unkillable -- by order of the Fire Lord.

The cell door creaked open, and the prisoner, chained to the floor, sat as upright as she could. Azula was a mess -- hair unkempt, eyes glittering, fingernails long. She smiled viciously at the figure. "Come to gloat, peasant?"

The figure stepped forward, revealing herself as Katara of the Southern Water Tribe. Her voice was as hard as ice. "Azula, Princess of the Fire Nation, by official decree of Fire Lord Zuko-"

"My brother is no Fire Lord! It should be me! ME!!" spat Azula.

"You are to be imprisoned indefinitely, not by bars of iron, but by sheets of ice."

The mad princess drew back, confused. What could she mean by this? Then, Katara drew a pouch from the folds of her robe. "Spirit water has many properties," she said. "Beyond healing, it can also change people -- people like you." With that, she started to waterbend a cocoon of glowing water around Azula. The princess staggered; her head was pounding, like her skull was too small for her brain. Her eyes bulged. She grew dizzy, and her legs gave out from under her. The last thing she saw before unconsciousness was the room growing larger around her, with Katara at it center, looming up and up and up and up....

Then, nothing.

Katara took the small ball of ice -- no larger than a fist -- and looked inside. There was Azula, asleep. Katara breathed on the ice, and the ball went from clear to opaque with her breath. Then she put it in the pouch she had brought the water in, and was escorted out. She knew, as she left the confines of the prison, what would happen. There would be a rumor that Azula had escaped, been spirited away to some island beyond the western ends of the Fire Nation. As the guessing and speculations grew to fever pitch, Zuko, apparently bowing to pressure, would check and find her missing. His critics would be silenced, and he could sleep without fear at night. Meanwhile, Katara would head back home, back to the Southern Water Tribe where the ice never melts, and hide away the little ball of ice until sometime in the distant future, when the Hundred Years War was little more than legend, when the world had moved on. Maybe then she could release the Fire Princess onto the world.

Maybe, always maybe...

****
Many Years Later
****

Korra and the Airbenders had stopped by the Southern Water Tribe to meet with Katara. As Oogi, Tenzin's air bison, landed on the packed snow fields, the elderly Katara came out of the house.

"Grandma!" shrieked the children as they ran to her.

"Hello, Mother" said Tenzin, looking frazzled. "I'm sorry we can't stay long, but we've got a celebration to get to -- even Lord Zuko will be there! So sorry for the short notice, but the kids demanded-"

"Oh. that all right." said Katara, waving a hand dismissively. "I do have something for Korra, though. Follow me."

Korra followed the old waterbender into her igloo. Katara grabbed an old sealskin pouch, reached inside, and took out a ball of ice. "I want you to give this to the Fire Lord." she whispered, handing it to the Avatar. "This...amulet...holds great meaning to him. I'm sorry I can't come myself, but these old bones aren't meant for air bison anymore."

Korra inspected the amulet, then pocketed it. "Thanks!" she said loudly. "Will do!"

A couple days later, they reached Air Temple Island. When they landed in the sweltering hot sun, Pema came forward to her husband. "I'm sorry dear, but it looks like Lord Zuko won't be attending."

"What?" gasped Tenzin. "He won't? Why not?"

"Something came up in the Fire Nation that required his attention. Now as for your other guests..."

Meanwhile, Korra came up to her room. It was beastly hot, and all she could do was set the amulet on the table and flop down on the bed, hoping she wasn't sweating as hard as she felt she was. As she lay there, the first few drops of water came off the ball of ice, and a dark spot at the center became clear. The thing in the center was still asleep, asleep as it had been for decades, but now its bonds were loosening. For the first time in more than eighty years, Azula, Princess of the Fire Nation, began to stir. More drops began to run off as the heat steadily melted the ice. By now, Korra had gotten up and was about to start with preparations for the party, when she noticed the amulet and the growing puddle of water surrounding it. She was about to attempt to refreeze it when she noticed something in the center. Something dark, something not water...

For the first time in nearly a century Azula opened her eyes...

Korra bent down closer to get a better view, but then she heard a insistent knocking at the door -- Ikki and Jinora. "Mom says you need to come down to help -- now!"

"Just a second!" replied the Avatar. She knew she really should get to helping, but there was something captivating about that spot in the center...

Azula was awake. In the glaring sunlight that pierced through the ice, she knew how to escape. She breathed fire into her prison, which began to glow, and turn white-hot. Suddenly it burst, and once more the teenaged Fire Princess was free. But what was her first sight upon liberation?

1. An empty room -- Korra had left with Ikki and Jinora. Lost yet determined to escape, Azula will leave the room and try to flee. But instead of finding the exit, she first runs into an unaware Ikki and Jinora.

2. Korra -- The new Avatar, intrigued by this chain of events, finds out who this tiny girl is and shows her off to the Airbender twins. Together, all three become Azula's new wardens, and the island becomes her new prison
1552331.title: Old Enemy for a New Avatar

15523311.content:
Originally written by Mr. Phorcys (26)

Azula burst out of the ice and looked around. She was in a massive room. A massive, empty room. Was this what that filthy waterbender was playing at? A new cell? But no, it was too nice compared to her previous prison -- maybe her pathetic brother had one of his guilt twinges and was 'merciful'... No matter. She was going to have her revenge and reclaim her throne -- but first, to escape!

It was all too easy to find a way out of her cell. First, she leapt down from her high table, using jets of blue flame to cushion her fall. Her landing was slightly erratic -- it had been some time since she had last been allowed to use her powers, after all -- but she quickly recovered. The door was even easier than she had hoped. There was a gap, small enough to be practically unnoticeable for anyone else, but large enough for her to squeeze through.

On the other side of the door, there was a wide, austere hall. Nothing for Azula to hide behind, but no matter. She just crept close to the wall. There were no guards yet... strange, but maybe little Zu-zu didn't want a repeat of last time. Then, as Azula neared the end of the hall, she heard an all-too familiar sound. The sound of a strong wind being harnessed and contained. The sound of airbending. At last, the Avatar!

Azula kept quiet, back flat against the wall. If she could kill Aang, she would remove the greatest obstacle to her eventual return. Then she could head on a little journey to the Northern Water Tribe -- pretend to be a victim of some unfortunate accident with spirits. She could convince them to regrow her, and then she would be free and ready to rally the disloyal nobles of the Fire Nation to her cause. It would be glorious!

Azula then prepared to strike. She would fry him with lightning, then burn him to finish the job. The sound of air grew closer and closer now...

Azula leapt to the center of the hall and lashed out...

The bolt struck the orange and yellow robes...

"OW!" yelped Ikki, who was entering the room on a ball of air. The sharp sting of a static shock caused her concentration to lapse for a moment, and her air scooter dispersed. The young airbender's backside slammed down hard on the wooden floor. Azula was given no time to react before the enormous giantess's rear dropped on her.

Besides outrage and humiliation, her mind stewed on the fact that here was another airbender who was not the Avatar. How could this be? Even if Sozin's initial purge of the Temples had somehow missed a few airbenders, it was impossible that there could be an enclave so long after the systemic destruction began. How was there another airbender? How?

She was given little time to reflect, however, as Ikki quickly jumped up. Azula started to fall off her behind, but was then caught up in the reformed air scooter. As the Fire princess was trapped in a cataclysmic whirlwind, Ikki sped away, looking for her sister.

Eventually, Ikki found Jinora as she was walking to the meditation room. "What are we doing now?" asked Ikki.

"Dad wants us to go meditate or just not bother him. I'm meditating. Wanna join me?"

Ikki thought for a moment. "Nah." Then she turned to leave, but Jinora called out. "Oh, and Dad wants us to not use air scooters. Says it's noisy enough as is. Be sure to put your boots on."

At that moment, Azula attempted to break free from the spinning orb of howling wind. The airbender girl -- who must be part of some hidden airbender family, judging from the other girl's actions -- was slowly easing the ball of wind, making it safe enough for Azula to use her jets once more. But even the comparatively safe winds were powerful, and Azula was buffeted off course.

Where does she land?

1. In a pair of boots -- a barefoot Ikki is about to put on some shoes, and Azula will be somewhere she's never been before... at someone's feet.

2. On a meditation rug in the next room -- Jinora is going to plop down, pinning Azula, who won't take this insult sitting down.
15523311.title: Azula Against Airbenders

The former heir to Ozai turned her head as far as she could, and saw the orange-clad giantess walking in her direction. Even if she could could get up in time -- and she couldn't -- there would be no way for Azula to outpace the young airbender. All she could do was watch as the red pillars of the girl's boots stomped closer and closer -- swung over her position, pausing just in front of her. The giant novice made some arm motions that Azula couldn't make out... and then she began to sit.

FWUMP!

Jinora's robe-covered rear plowed into Azula, forcing her deeper into the mat. The princess pushed as hard as she could against the massive butt, to no avail. Then, the airbender, determined to be rid of the irritant, looked to make sure nobody was coming before lifting her left, then her right buttock and scratching furiously before settling down again. Did she?

155233112.title: Jinora's Meditation Troubles

1552331122.content:
Originally written by Mr. Phorcys (26)

Jinora no longer felt the bug. She wriggled once more and resumed meditation, unaware that the one-time Fire Princess that she had heard so many stories about was now bug-sized and unconscious under her rump. Azula's breathing was shallow, and her body was deeply pressed into the mat by the orange-clad backside. But she was alive.

An hour passed.

Eventually, the young airbender sensed footsteps coming down the hall. She unfolded her legs and stood up, leaving twin indentations where her butt had been -- and had she looked closer, she would have seen a small, dark figure pressed in one of them. But she did not, and she walked over to the doorway. Jinora didn't need seismic sense to know who was coming. Only one person on the island wore heavy boots indoors (to the immense exasperation of Pema, whose eternal duty it was to try and keep the island clean).

As the preteen turned to walk down the hallway, Korra rounded the corner and headed for the room that Jinora had just left. She raised her arm in a casual greeting as she stomped past. "Hey."

Jinora returned, barely glancing in the Avatar's direction. "Hey."

Then, as they both were about to exit the hall, Jinora half-turned to face Korra. "Hey, Korra?"

"Yeah?"

"Mom would like it if you didn't train in your boots."

The Avatar nodded. "Alright." Then she entered the room, and Jinora went around the corner.

Korra stopped before she trod on the mats. She slipped her feet out of her boots and planted them on the ground. Her toes wriggled and clenched as she wondered what her training routine would be. The waterbender had long since discovered that the climate of Republic City, especially at this time, was not boot-wearing weather. At first, she wore her boots out of necessity -- it wasn't like she could pack a wardrobe in Naga's saddlebag, and Tenzin hadn't decided to buy shoes for his children seven years in advance. Then, as her position at Airbender Island became more stable, she kept the boots because they reminded her of home. But unlike her Water Tribe coat, her boots couldn't easily shed their layers when they weren't needed, and if she wore socks with her leather boots in Republic City, it felt like she was trapping her feet in a furnace. The solution she had come up with was to just not wear socks, to go barefoot in her boots.

The end result of this was that both her feet and the inside of her boot reeked of filth and sweat. Despite being a waterbender, Korra had never shied away from getting dirty. Besides, she had been earthbending for nearly as long as she had been waterbending, so she was fine with a little grime. It wasn't like anyone was around her to look at her feet.

Azula's eyes snapped opened as she heard the first foot step onto the mat. Even at a distance, she could sense the pungent odor of Korra's unwashed body. Shaking off the aches of being the giant girl's seat for so long, she rose unsteadily to her feet. The new girl was wearing a light blue... something. It was just a form-fitting piece of clothing with no sleeves. It appeared to be Water Tribe, but the waterbenders usually lived in climates that were far too cold for that sort of clothing. The giantess pulled some water out of a pouch by her side and started to manipulate it. Whoever she was, she was indeed a waterbender.

The beginnings of a plan formed in Azula's mind. Then Korra lumbered over to where Azula was, bringing her overpowering foot-stench with her. Azula rolled out of the way of the giantess's smelly foot, but a drop of sweat from Korra's exposed armpit hit Azula directly on the head and engulfed her, trap ping her on the mat. Korra shifted her foot to the side. Her toes raked across the surface of the droplet, smearing it across the mat and unintentionally freeing Azula. If the Avatar felt anything damper than usual, she made no sign of it. She pressed her foot flat against the floor, and the tiny Fire Princess was stuck in the vaunted arch of Korra's toes, which were too close together for her to squirm out of, and too low for her to crawl.

Then Korra curled her toes. The roof of foul-smelling flesh became a tube for Azula. The dirt-caked pad of one of the giantess's toes slammed into Azula's side and lifted her up to the 'ceiling'. Little bits of the sweat-moisture from Korra's armpit mixed with the dirt to form a sticky, stinky mud that adhered the tiny child of Ozai to the bronzed flesh of her toe. Azula's struggles only appeared to cause discomfort, because the more she thrashed, the tighter Korra's toes curled. And as the titanic teenager exercised, some of her toe's own sweat started to appear, carving light paths in the layers of filth on top of her heating skin.

Still, Azula did not dare use fire at this time, for fear of being crunched between those colossal toes. She was going through hell, but she would keep going. If she could recover her size, that would be worth this torture and more.

Finally, after an eternity of workout torture, Korra finished, giving her enough time to feel that there was something between her toes. She kicked out her foot, uncurling her toes as she did so, sending Azula flying off into space. The tiny Fire Princess landed on something clean, white, and soft. For a while, her body collapsed, just wanting to lie down and sleep again after such a terrible activity. In that time, Korra stomped on over. There had been nothing on her feet besides the usual grime, so she might as well towel off before putting her boots back on. Absentmindedly, the behemoth Avatar grabbed the towel Azula was resting on and rubbed it forcefully in her sweaty armpits. Then she looked down at her breasts, which glistened with sweat. She resolved to clean those off too.

But as she moved the now-rather-smelly towel to her ample chest, she noticed a small dark shape on the towel. Probably just a piece of grime, she thought. A very odd piece of grime. It almost looks... alive...

Pathetically, Azula raised an arm and attempted to punch the air. Even from her perspective, the blue fire was barely a spark. The once and future Fire Princess slumped on the pale towel, awaiting the judgement of the poorly-dressed waterbender.

Korra squinted at the dark shape for another three seconds before deciding that it was...

1. A person -- Korra is very apologetic and only wants to help the self-described "poor citizen run afoul of spirits" -- and Azula plans her return...

2. Grime -- Korra lightly towels off her sweaty breasts, leaving Azula stuck in her cleavage as she heads off to dinner with the rest of the members of Air Temple Island -- and Azula tries to escape...
1552331122.title: Korra's Exercise

15523312.content:
Originally written by Mr. Phorcys (26)

Azula bust through the ice. The first sight she had in seventy years was of a giant woman, clad in light blue Water Tribe garments -- most likely some waterbender servant of her brother. This suspicion was confirmed when the woman casually moved the melted spirit water into a nearby cup. But the woman was looking at her with an expression that the princess wasn't used to -- one of confusion. The giantess rumbled, "Who are you?"

Azula's nostrils flared. Of course she'd be slighted by the guard, even if this did seem to be a rather luxurious prison. "Oh, I'm just a poor farmer who ran afoul of spirits and got shrunken for no reason at all," she replied with as much sarcasm as she could muster.

Her guard's expression changed to one of shock. "Really?" she boomed.

Azula snorted. Great. A guard with as much sense as a rock. Might as well play along. This girl could be a useful pawn. "Yes. Just a humble servant of the Fire Lord, Ozai."

That should have gotten a laugh, or at least a correction to 'Zuko', but instead, the giantess's face showed only concern. "Ozai? You mean Lord Zuko's father? Wasn't he deposed by Avatar Aang, like, seventy years ago?"

"...what?"

"Yeah, Ozai's been gone for decades now. Same as Aang. Fire Lord Zuko's still around, though. You must have been in that ice for a long time, huh?"

The former Fire Princess staggered back. Seventy years? Her father gone? Her brother reigning? The Avatar... dead? She looked around the room. This was no cell -- it was her "guard's" room! What could she do now? She was a relic! The enormous lady seemed to notice her distress and got up. "I'll get Jinora and Ikki. They're Aang's grandkids, by the way."

"Who- Where's the new Avatar?" Azula managed to splutter out.

"You're looking at her. Name's Korra." Then she closed the door, leaving Azula alone.

***

A while later, Korra returned with two girls in orange-and-yellow robes. She introduced them to Azula. "This is Jinora and this is Ikki. Girls, this is-"

The taller one gasped. "Azula!"

"Who?"

"That's Azula. She's Lord Zuko's sister. She was an evil sadist who went mad with power, went insane, and also planned to burn the entire continent of the Earth Kingdom."

Korra looked like she was about to object when the smaller girl -- Ikki -- darted forward. The young airbender reached out for the tiny princess, saying, "Aw, come on, guys, she doesn't look so -- EEEEE!" She quickly dropped Azula and stuck her now-singed fingers into her mouth. Not everyone had seen the brilliant blue flash of fire, but everyone knew what had happened.

Azula landed at the feet of a now-vengeful Korra. She looked up just in time to the new Avatar, whose face was a cold mask of righteous fury, bend down and grab her in her massive hand. She struggled, but Korra simply tightened her grip, driving the air out of Azula's lungs. Meanwhile, Ikki started to cry from the pain. Then Korra placed her free hand reassuringly on Ikki's right shoulder and said, "Don't worry, Ikki, I'll make it up to you. How about I take Azula and...

1. Make you a popsicle" -- Korra will freeze Azula and give her to Ikki to make up for the burning.

2. Have a little chat with her" -- Azula will be taken to the garage and be taped to the seat of Asami Sato's motorcycle.

She swore that if she survived this, she would find a way to get back to normal size and have Korra and Asami shrunken down and made into a pair of sandals, so that they could spend the rest of their miserable lives with their faces pressed into her royal soles. As for the airbending brats, she decided that she was going to take another stab at the elimination of the Avatars that Fire Lord Sozin had almost accomplished, but this time, by eating them alive.

Azula's blissful thoughts of tiny airbenders squirming down her throat were interrupted suddenly as Asami came back into view. Azula had been sure the torment was over, but she only now realized the terrible truth: they were only halfway done. Asami had just finished her errands, and now she had to head back to Air Temple Island. She did her best to squirm for Asami's attention, hoping she would look down at the seat, but Asami didn't notice anything at all as she allowed her still slightly sweaty butt to plop back down onto the bike seat, sealing Azula back in the darkness for a very similar experience.


--------

When Asami finally arrived back at home, Korra was there waiting for her a friendly wave and smile. She was happy to see her girlfriend of course, but she was even more excited to see what sort of state the tiny Fire Nation Princess was in. Asami hopped off her bike and gave Korra hug, forgetting all about her plan to deal with her lumpy seat. Korra took this opportunity to look over Asami's shoulder to see if she could make out Azula. She couldn't help but smile when she spotted her....


1. Practically flattened against Asami's bike seat.
2. Stuck to Asami's ass, black tape blending in with her black leather pants.
1552331222.title: Errands Under Ass-ami

1552332.content:
Amon, criminal leader of the terrorist group calling themselves the Equalists had been missing for a little over two days. With no sign of his body in the wreckage of his escape boat that his brother Tarlock had destroyed, the man formerly known as Noatak was presumed dead, his body most likely somewhere at the bottom of the ocean. What nobody realized was the fact that Amon had managed to save himself just before the explosion struck by using his father's psychic Bloodbending technique to toss his own body to safety. However he did not survive the explosion unscathed, the impact still managed to leave him unconscious with a rather unusual side effect taking place.

Amon's body drifted, following the ocean's current back towards Republic City for an unlikely reunion with a certain young girl. The waves carried his body for some time, death almost appearing imminent for the fugitive Bloodbender. However, fortune seemed to smile upon him, or laugh in his face as his body was washed ashore on the beach at Air Temple Island just outside the city limits. How cruel fate was to bring him to such a place, but still the worst had yet to be discovered.

Some time passed and Amon's lifeless body rested on the sand until the tide came in, splashing him with a rather large wave and washing his body further up the beach. He regained consciousness for the first time in days, stumbling to his feet on top of the wet sand. He was still dazed and a little out of his wits after 2 days without food or fresh water to help him rehydrate. Still, he could immediately tell that something was off as he observed his surroundings. No doubt this was Air Temple Island but everything surrounding him was gigantic, even the sand surrounding him was large enough to pick up and hold in his hand like a rock.

As if things couldn't get any worse Amon found himself standing in a dark shadow, shaped like a person. He turned and took a fighting position, ready to use what little power he had at his current size to defend himself. His heart sank as the figured was revealed to be none other than Avatar Korra herself, standing over the inch tall criminal, hands on her hips, glaring down at him as if he were a bug that had royally managed to piss her off. It was unclear how long she was standing there for, but Amon was willing to wager that it had been some time before he regained consciousness.

"Well, well, look who finally decided to wake up! Not so big and tough now are you?" Korra asked, belittling the enemy standing in front of her giant boots.

"Avatar, I..." Was all Amon could muster before Korra stomped her boot into the sand not far from him, cutting him off from speaking.

"You know, we all thought you were dead, but honestly this is so much better! You're gonna pay for all the innocent lives you ruined, starting with me!" Korra proclaimed threateningly.

"Ahh yes, you're bending. What if I said I could restore you to your former glory, would you release me then?" Amon asked, thinking he might be able to make some kind of a deal. Little did he realize on major flaw and miscalculation in his plans.

"I don't know, you might wanna stick around for a while. I was thinking about having a barbeque, tell me. Would you prefer I cook you medium rare, or well done?" Korra asked, Firebending a ball of fire into her open palm. Amon was taken back at first, he could have sworn he'd removed her abilities to bend anything but air. But he could hardly be surprised when it came to the Avatar, in only 2 days she'd managed to regain her bending which could only mean he was in bigger trouble than he originally thought.

"So you regained your bending Avatar, I'm impressed," Amon said, trying to maintain his composure. He couldn't allow the towering Avatar to see him sweat or it would be all over for him. He could try Bloodbending her, but he's never moved a mass equal to Korra's size before with his powers and if he failed he would only make her angrier with him.

"What wrong, you look pretty nervous down there. Am I too BIG of an opponent for you? Maybe I should get Jinora or Ikki out here too deal with you? I'm sure they wouldn't have too much trouble stomping you out!" Korra teased, though she wasn't exactly wrong. Korra was gigantic compared to him and though he hated to admit it his chances of survival would be far greater if he was fighting either of the two young Airbenders.

Korra wasted no time in bending over to grab Amon, her hand swooping down at lightning fast speeds and lifting the shrunken Bloodbender off the sand and under the gaze of her cold blue eyes. The dark skinned woman smiles evilly as she thought about all the possible ways that she could now torture and humiliate her tiny foe. Already having something special in mind she wished to do first, assigning him to a jail cell where he belonged.

"Unfortunately for you, I want to keep a closer eye on you till I can determine whether or not you're still a threat. So I'm placing you under arrest, you'll be happy to know that you're jail time until we can make a cell small enough for you will be spent close to my person. Very close. In fact, you're gonna be a close as possible because I'm keeping you ____________ where I can keep an eye on you.

1. "Inside of my boot"- Korra tells Amon that because he is now bug-sized he should get used to being stepped on, taking off her boot and dropping him inside so she can walk all over him. Taunting him with the fact that she'd just finished training before she found him, saying he shouldn't expect any pleasant smells.

2. "Between my boobs"- Korra pushes Amon into the depths of her cleavage, finally finding a use for her oversized breasts after all this time, as a prison cell. Completely entombed in flesh Amon struggles to even breath fresh air between Korra's enormous tits. But will his struggles grant him freedom or lead to something even worse?

3. "Stuck to Naga's saddle" - Korra calls her loyal Polar Bear Dog to help punish Amon's for his past crimes, using a Sato Industries adhesive to stick Amon to her seat. Telling him she'll use the solvent on him if he survives the ride.
1552332.title: Amon's Tiny Comeback

15523321.content:
"I think my boot will serve as a perfect Jail for a little bug like you Amon. At your size, you'd get stomped on hundreds of times, maybe even thousands anyways throughout your pathetic life. At least in my boots, you'll have the honor of being under the Avatar's feet. Comforting them as my insole wherever I go, soaking up my foot sweat while I'm training, in fact, I'm sure you have all kinds of uses now that you're so small." Korra threatened, terrifying Amon as these threats rolled off her tongue mere minutes after finding him in his shrunken state. Almost like she'd been planning this out for weeks, or even months.

The 17-year-old girl's cold stare sent shivers down his spine, inspiring the same fear into the Equalist leader that once filled Korra's very being, only multiplied by a thousand. She could end him anytime she chooses, obliterating him from the face of the Earth in any number of ways.

Terrified by this fact, he forgot to even object to his new holding cell under the Avatar's foot. Possibly even doing so in the effort of self-preservation as Korra slipped one foot behind the other, sliding her barefoot out of her boot to make way for the disgraced Bloodbender.

"No arguments?" Korra asked genuinely surprised, never imagining that she'd have Amon so outclassed, maybe he's snap out of it once he was underneath her foot. At least, that's what she thought to herself as she lowered her unceremoniously towards the ground, the scent of her feet built up over months rising to greet him halfway.

The stench, however, wasn't nearly as bad as the heat emanating from below. Like being dangled over a furnace, but then again, it was hardly surprising for a girl who shot balls of fire from her feet. Amon's body reacted to the combination of heat and the smell, acting on impulses to try and escape. A smile appearing on Korra's face as she felt the inch tall man come to life between her fingertips, then effortlessly condemned him to her footwear with a flick of her wrist.

Amon shot through the opening of her boot, rolling on top of the insole for a few feet before falling into a ridge. Upon standing up and getting his barrings, Amon discovered that he was centered in the imprint left behind by the Avatar's foot. He was standing where the ball of her foot would most likely rest, closer to the exit was a larger indentation caused by her heel, and in front of him were five smaller imprints left behind by her toes, each one either equal or larger than his body in size.

The boot began to rumble as Korra's toes drummed on the outside, wanting to give Amon a heads up that she was about to put it back on with him inside. The light coming from outside was eclipsed by her foot as it crept towards him, effortlessly bulldozing him and knocking him to the ground. The young Avatar twisted her foot in a downward motion, pinning Amon between her toes and the ball of her foot for 'safe'keeping.

"Honestly, these are a lot more comfortable with you inside them Amon. You might have a real future as an insole." Korra teased, when in fact that was a promise. Amon was at the mercy of her toes. There was no escaping such a harsh reality.

He struggled and kicked the best he could as she flexed her toes, clutching his face between her brown digits. But Korra only laughed as the vibrations from his voice tickled her skin, she couldn't quite make out what he was saying, but she could only assume it was a plea for mercy. Unfortunately, she was fresh out and ready to begin the real fun. Having Amon underfoot would certainly make her _______ more enjoyable.

1. Fire, Water, & Earthbending practice- having mastered these elements, Korra continues to hone her skills. Making sure that they are put to good use torturing Amon.

2. Airbending training- Korra meets with Ikki and Jinora for a lesson while Tenzin and Melo are visiting Katara, hoping to get a better handle on her new Airbending abilities. However, after seeing the girls in action, Korra decides to slip Amon into one of their flats.

3. Hangout with Asami- They were not dating at this time, so they are only good friends. Korra and Asami now hang out regularly and get along well since they have similar interests. Will torturing Amon become something else they share? That's up for Korra to decide(She does).
15523321.title: Serving Time Under Korra's Feet

choices: Shauna Helps in a Sizeable Situation
155311.content:
Now comes the Pokemon Series that in my opinion brought some life back to the Anime. Ash is finally Seventeen, growing up 7 years overnight because that's how puberty works. He meets up with a girl named Serena who he'd met before as a child, he also becomes friends with yet another Gym Leader named Clemont who is an inventor and his younger sister Bonnie. I'm sure you know enough about this Anime to jump right into it and if you don't it probably wouldn't take you too long to find out. Anyways lets see the first set of choices.
