2. Ash and Friends, Bonnie excluded(because I don't wanna shrink her) are all shrunk when a mischievous Pokemon crosses their path. While enroute to a Pokemon Center to get help Bonnie runs into Shauna who offers her assistance.

You know the drill, option 3 is 'More Choices' please feel free to add some there.
155311.title: Pokemon X & Y

1553111.content:
"Pikachu, use Electro Ball!" Ash yelled as the two did some training with Clemont and his newest machine. The battle defense robot, able to absorb most attacks and then counter properly, making it an ideal method of training.

The robot released rubber pads from its chest compartment, negating the powerful electric discharge. It then countered, launching several rocks at Pikachu to mimic a rock type attack.

"Pikachu, dodge it," Ash commanded, which resulted in Pikachu narrowly avoiding the hit.

"Excellent, my device is working just as I designed." Clemont gloated, secretly hoping that this machine would be the first of his many creations that didn't blow up in his face. Unfortunately, with Ash around it was only a matter of time before things took a turn for the worse.

"Pikachu, use Volt Tackle!" Ash yelled, leading his Pokemon partner to charge towards the robot while surrounded by a powerful electric field.

"Wait, Ash, I haven't programmed in defenses for a move that strong yet." Clemont tried to explain, but it was already too late as Pikachu used its speed to maneuver under the Robot's shield and attack it directly, causing Clemont to panic as a result.

"Uh-oh, this is bad," Clemont told himself, realizing that the experimental battery he put in the robot was being charged by the electric mouse's assault before long it would explode.

The machine Spasming in an attempt to rid itself of the excess electricity, while Clemont and Ash rushed the control panel to disable it, Ash quickly yelling out to Pikachu "Find Serena and Bonnie and bring them back here.".

Pikachu quickly left, and the two tried to shut down the machine but to no avail. The display screen cracked, and the two hit the grass for cover before the big,

*Bang*

The Robot exploded as bits and pieces were flung all around the training grounds, releasing a negative magnetic field that affected all living things in its proximity. Of course, this included both Clemont and Ash who were opening their eyes to an entirely new landscape from the training field.

The two were separated by about thirty or so feet, which they would soon come to realize was only about six inches. "Whoa, where are we?" Ash asked, surprised to see grass even taller than he was.

"It's strange, but any number of possibilities could explain this. Here, let's compare notes and see what we can find out." Clemont announced, walking towards Ash before being interrupted by a powerful earthquake.

*Boom, Boom, Boom, Boom!*

Thundering tremors shook the very Earth beneath them, each shock stronger than the one that came before, quickly associating these quakes with a large pokemon such as Onyx. However, the appearance of a large shadow over them suggested an even larger Pokemon was to blame.

*Boom!*

The quake with the most destructive force yet came to them in the form of a gigantic pink sandal, one Ash and Clemont recognized immediately. The giant sandal-clad foot, landing in the open space between them, nearly crushing them both. It was the same kind that Bonnie, Clemont's younger sister wore every day.

"Where did my brother and Ash go?" Boomed a familiar voice, the two looking up to confirm their suspicions that it was none other than Bonnie herself towering over them. But how was this possible? Had Clemont's machine turned her into a giant? A quick observation of the tree dwarfing Bonnie confirmed otherwise. They'd been shrunk, making them even smaller than Joltik(The smallest Pokemon).

And while Clement was already finding it hard to comprehend the fact that he now had a two-hundred-seventy-five-foot tall sister another giant was already on her way to make them feel even smaller.

*Boom, Boom, Boom, Boom!*

The second series of aftershocks followed the initial Earthquakes cause by Bonnie's stomping feet, though they were calmer and didn't occur as quickly. These belonged to none other than Serena who stopped behind Bonnie to take a look around "Don't worry, I'm sure they're just fine, It's not like Clemont hasn't blown us all up before right?" Serena joked, secretly worried about Ash. Pikachu was also behind them.

She had no idea they were secretly next to Bonnie's foot, giving them a perfectly unobscured view of Bonnie's legging-clad butt and her own panties hidden from everyone but Ash and Clemont underneath her skirt. Although, despite their best efforts not to look up Serena's Skirt, it was nearly impossible due to her size and their current position. After all, she was close to four hundred feet tall through their eyes.

"Bonnie, Serena! We're down here! Down here!" Ash and Clemont yelled, jumping up and down near Bonnie's foot in the hope of drawing attention to themselves. Though it was difficult when they were smaller than even the tiniest of Bug Type Pokemon, so small that the grass surrounding them reached up to their necks.

What will happen next?

1. Bonnie looks down and sees Ash and Clemont by her feet, becoming excited and asking how they became so little and cute. Then convinces them through her size too let her keep them as her dolls until Clemont thinks of a way to reverse this.

2. Serena points out something by Bonnie's feet and has the younger girl move before addressing Ash and Clemont herself, promising to keep them safe from the outside world for a while.

3. Serena convinces Bonnie that they are most likely fine, suggesting they have a picnic to pass the time hoping Ash and Clemont will come back in time. Laying out a picnic blanket over them and laying down on it with Bonnie while the two boys try not to get smushed to death under the blanket.
1553111.title: Best Invention Ever

15531111.content:
Being younger and shorter than Serena put Bonnie at a low enough level too hear Ash and Clemont's cries for attention, looking down at her feet while Serena continued to survey the surrounding area for the boys.

Bonnie knelled down, bending her knees after she saw something moving close to her pink Mary Jane shoes. They couldn't have been Pokemon, even Joltik weren't so tiny in size. "Huh, Serena! Look quick, I found them, I found them!" she cheered joyously, jumping up and down on her tippy toes, creating nothing short of a small Earthquake for the shrunken duo.

"What are you talking about? I don't see them anywhere." Serena asked, spinning around to see that they were still alone, or so she thought. Her attention however quickly turned to Bonnie's feet, watching as two diminutive figures ran back and forth in fear of being stepped on in the midst of Bonnie's jumping.

"Bonnie, calm down please! I can't keep this up for long!" Clemont yelled, not believing his voice would reach the eight year old's ears over the sound of her own laughter. Luckily for Ash and Clemont, Serena soon came to the rescue, walking up behind Bonnie and gently holding her down to protect her shrunken friends first before wondering how they became so tiny in the first place.

"Good job Bonnie, now I understand you're excited. But please try and calm down, I'm sure we look really big from way down there and it could be dangerous for them if we accidentally step on them." Serena pointed out, standing over the boys behind Bonnie, allowing her to take the lead.

"Oh, you're right! I'll just pick them up so I don't accidentally hurt them." Bonnie announced, turning her attention down to her feet, grinning ear to ear as she lowered herself down to their level. "Okay boys, try to stand still for me. Okay?" Bonnie giggled, reaching down.

"Right!" Ash and Clemont yelled in unison, stiffening up at the sight of Bonnie's giant fingers, going against their own survival instincts, telling them too flee from the gigantic blonde girl. Her hand swiping across the dirt, scooping them both into the center of her palm with ease before lifting them up to level with her chest so she could look down at them from a closer vantage point.

"Awe, you two are so cute at this size. Like teeny tiny little dolls!" Bonnie cheered happily, holding up her opposite hand, fingers separated by about an inch.

"Um, thanks Bonnie. But I hope that we're not gonna be like this for long?" Ash replied, not liking the thought of being compared to dolls after the whole Sabrina affair in Saffron City during his original adventures throughout the Kanto region.

"Awe, you're not? But I was looking forward to playing with you guys. Can't you stay tiny for just a few days?" Bonnie asked, wanting to make them her personal playthings.

"Come on boys, can't you do it for Bonnie?" Serena asked, doting on her like she was her big sister. "I mean, can you even reverse what happened to you?" trying to help Bonnie get her way, thinking she could force them into playing with Bonnie as a last resort.

"I mean, no. Not yet anyways, I'll need some time to figure out the specifics." answered Clemont, all but sealing their fate as Bonnie's playthings. The young blonde's face lighting up as he said these words, instinctively closing her hand into a fist around them and bouncing with glee. Meanwhile, Ash and Clemont rolled between her fingers like they were inside of a washing machine.

"Careful now Bonnie, I'll let you play with them for now but you have to promise not to overdo it. Alright?" Serena asked, leaving Ash and Clemont unable to object vocally while pounding against Bonnie's fingers.

"Yes, of course. Thank you Serena!" she giggled, opening her hand into a flat surface for them to stand on. Giving them a view of Serena as she walked away.

"I'll be right over here if you need me." Serena called out, leaving the boys at Bonnie's mercy.

Looking up they could see that she was smiling from ear to ear, considering all sorts of games she could play with them. Which one will she choose?

1. Bonnie says they must have been scared of her at first, comparing herself to a giant monster before saying that it would actually be fun to play as a giant monster, placing them back at her feet and chasing them through the grass.

2. Bonnie removes her Mary Jane shoes and drops one of the boys inside each of them, telling them to climb on before she puts them back on, laughing at them as they struggle to climb out.

3. You choose what she does next.
15531111.title: Bonnie's New Dolls

155331.title: Yu Yu Hakusho

choices: A Wedge Between Keiko and Yusuke
1553312.content:
It had been a few weeks since the closing of the Dark Tournament and Yusuke's powers had yet to return, Botan certainly hadn't been any help as of late, and even Genkai was stumped.

Forced back into his normal life, Yusuke found it hard to cope with attending full days of school, easing his boredom with quick street brawls and video games at the local arcade.

It was after school hours and Yusuke had fallen asleep at his desk during the final class of the day. The other students leaving without trying to wake him in fear of what he might do. Even the teachers left him to sleep, thinking he would wake up sooner or later.

Only the students from after school activities remained, one of which was very upset with Yusuke as she stomped her way down the hall. Keiko Yukimura, the class representative of Sarayashiki Junior High School and Yusuke's oldest friend.

"Dumb boy, hasn't matured at all since he was five years old. I bet he skipped class again, explains why I didn't see him at all passing through the school gate!" Keiko yelled throughout the halls, believing that she was alone in this part of the school.

Her voice echoing loud enough to wake the sleeping Yusuke, rubbing his eyes at the same point Keiko stopped in front of the door to the classroom. Looking around to see the dimly lit classroom surrounding him, although something about the room bothered him even more than the fact that it was dark.

The door slid open and Keiko waltzed inside, lowering her bag to the floor and sealing herself inside before turning on the overhead lights. The bright bulbs shining down on Yusuke from above like several suns, shielding his eyes from the blinding light.

"Looks like I was right." Keiko announced, scanning the room to confirm that she was alone, or so she believed.

She had too do something to help her grandfather get stronger, knowing she couldn’t ask shenron to return Goku to normal she developed a plan that would help him get stronger. First she gathered the Earth’s seven Dragon Balls atop the Lookout Tower where Goku was training inside of the Hyperbolic Time Chamber. Of course she couldn’t join him just yet because she was too weak to help him improve, for now anyways.

She decided that if she couldn’t make Goku stronger, then she’d just have to make him weaker temporarily so she’d be strong enough to help him with his training. The twelve year old quarter Saiyan placed each of the orange orbs within a few inches of each other on the ground and summoned the Namekian dragon Shenron.

“Come Shenron, come so you may grant my wish!” Pan exclaimed, following this the sky turned pitch black as clouds filled the sky. Immediately after the Dragon Balls began to glow, illuminating the surrounding area. Then with a flash of lightning the dragon appeared over Pan in the sky, his tail extending from the center of the Dragon Balls.

“I am Shenron, I shall grant you any wish your heart desires. Now speak!” The green dragon demanded, prompting Pan to make up her mind. Not that it took very long, she knew exactly how she planned to make Goku weaker than herself.

“I want you to take the Saiyan Goku and shrink him down to the size of a bug! I need him to be smaller and weaker than he is now so I can train him.” Pan demanded, picturing the ideal size for Goku’s training to be somewhere between ant size and the size of her pinky toe.

“Very well, it shall be done.” Shenron announced, his eyes glowing as he granted Pan’s wish. In the moment of silence Goku was inside the Hyperbolic Time chamber being shrunk down to the size Pan desired. First he went from being an adult to a little kid, now he was going to get a whole lot smaller.

“Your wish has been granted, farewell.” Shenron said before returning to the seven Dragon Balls, each of which started floated a feet feet above the tiled floor of the lookout before flying off in different directions. And with that the sky cleared and returned to its usual shade of blue. However this was only the start of Goku’s troubles.

With Shenron gone Pan was eager to get inside the Hyperbolic Time Chamber and see firsthand how tiny Goku had become. True her interest wasn’t solefully on training him, she had the feeling that this was gonna be fun.

Meanwhile inside of the Hyperbolic Time Chamber Goku was clueless as to what had just happened, the whole world was like an endless void. Only the entrance/exit had any detail to it, So focused on his own training Gku remained completely oblivious to the fact that his body had been reduced to a mere fraction of its original size.

Little did he realize what a big surprise he was in for as Pan snuck her way into the pocket dimension, she was careful to watch her step as she walked forward, not wanting to step of Goku accidentally. “Now where is he? “Pa-pa-pa-Pan!” was all the shrunken saiyan could say as he found himself looking up at a three hundred fifty foot tall version of his granddaughter. She was absolutely enormous, large enough to hold any saiyan in their primitive ape form like a stuffed animal.

“Hey, I hope you don’t mind. But I took the liberty of asking Shenron to shrink you for some special training.” Pan explained, placing her hands on her hips as she bent forward to look down on Goku from above.

“Special training?” Goku asked, wondering what type of training had in store. Was it only combat training or had she developed Ideas for other areas like strength training or speed training. With the immense size difference between the two, the possibilities for what Pan in store for Goku were endless.

“That’s right, I’ve made it my job to help make you even stronger. That’s why I had to shrink you, to help make me stronger by comparison for the duration of your training.” Pan explained, looking down on Goku from above.

“Now, I think that as your trainer I should first establish your strengths and weaknesses in battle. That’s why we’re gonna have a sparring match. Give me all you got, and in return I’ll ____________."

Pan continued doing this for a count of ten times before deciding Goku was ready.

"Now that I've finished warming up we can start your training. Now I hope you're listening down there cause I'm only gonna explain this once. Your goal is to survive between my butt-cheeks. If you can get out of my panties and onto the ground, you win and advance to the next stage of your training. If you can't, then you'll fail your training and I'll have to punish you even more. But if you can't handle it and pass out. Well, let's just say you're better off not knowing what I'll do." Pan announced, giving Goku three scenarios where only one was favorable to him.

"Okay, now that we've got that out of the way I think I'll tell you the exercises I'll be doing so you'll have a better chance of escaping on your own. I'll be starting with a 5-minute jog, the increased gravity inside the hyperbolic time chamber should help me increase my heartbeat. Next, I'll be sitting down for 10 crunches, followed by 10 squats, and rounded out by 10 lunges. I need you to remember that this isn't a workout for me, its an exercise to improve your abilities. Whether or not you pass is entirely up to you. Now, let's get started." Pan giggled, her tone suggesting that she was excited about her upcoming mini workout. Probably because it allowed her the opportunity to feel Goku struggle against her giant butt in a variety of different ways.

What happens?

1. Goku can't escape during Pan's jog but manages to break free of her ass before she sits down for crunches.

2. Goku becomes further wedged in Pan's cheeks and is unable to escape after Pan clenches her cheeks around his legs, refusing to let go.

3. Goku passes out during one of Pan's exercises, waking up to find himself either in Pan's bedroom or some other location waiting to receive a harsh punishment.
15533332122.title: Punishment By Pan's Butt

155333322.content:
Trunks and Goku regained consciousness slowly after experiencing a bizarre flash of light earlier, they had no idea who or what caused it, but they would soon find out.

Looking at each other and the surroundings behind them it was pretty clear that they were still inside the ship. However, something was seriously wrong because nothing was the proper size. Instead, everything surrounding them was gigantic.

"Goku, we've been shrunk." Trunks realized, coming to the obvious conclusion.

"Are you sure someone didn't just make the ship larger?" Goku asked, childishly amused by how big everything was.

"This isn't good! We need to find a way to get back to normal. But first, we have too..." Trunks trailed off as he realized one of them was missing.

"Wait, where's Pan?" He asked, his answer appearing in the form of a loud bang.

*Boom*

The ground shook behind them, cause both the shrunken Saiyan and Saiyan Hybrid to turn their heads in shock. Their eyes meeting with the familiar sight of one of Pan's purple and black boots, except it had also become gigantic compared to them.

Trunks hoped that this didn't mean what he thought it did, craning his neck upwards to the see a planet-sized version of Pan smiling down at them. She was massive, towering over them as if they were ant's compared to here which according to Trunk's estimation they practically were at only about a centimeter tall.

http://images6.fanpop.com/image/photos/3...

"Hi boys, did you have a good nap?" She asked, playing off her size as if nothing was wrong. Although, it was hard for her to keep a straight face when while she was talking to her two bug-sized companions.

"Whoa, Pan's huge!" Goku yelled, surprised by her impressive size enhancement. Still believing that the ship might have grown, and her along with it.

"Pan, what's going on here? What did you do to us‽" Trunks yelled, not exactly thrilled to be looking up at the ten-year-old quarter Saiyan girl.

"Hmm, well I might have borrowed this from your mom's study before we left." Pan teased, pointing to her wrist at a device that Goku quickly recognized as Bulma's Micro Band. A wristwatch she created that allowed the user to shrink themselves down to a fraction of their height. However, over the years Bulma had perfected the process to shrink other people and even make them smaller than the original product.

"Pan, how could you be so reckless? Unshrink now before somebody gets hurt!" Trunks argued, his voice hardly audible to the eight hundred foot tall tomboy.

"Why should I? I'm tired of being the only girl on this ship and getting no respect!" Pan's voice boomed, silencing Trunks' outcry.

"Maybe being the size of ants for a few days or maybe even a week will give you some perspective on how to treat a lady," Pan announced, beginning to crack a smile again as she imagined how much fun she'd be having during that time.

Deciding on a show of force to demonstrate her seriousness, Pan lifted her foot over Trunks and Goku, pausing for a few moments so they could get a good look at the underside of her sneaker. Then in a quick motion brought her foot down with a powerful stomp. Enjoying the view as she watched them scurry like cockroaches.

*Boom*

"Now do see how strong I am?" Pan asked in a cheerful tone, giggling as she leaned forward to get a better look at them. "Of course if you two tough guys think you can overpower me and take this back by force why then, by all means, why don't you give it a try?" Pan smirked, pointing to her watch. Hoping they would accept her challenge, so she had an excuse to demonstrate her real power.

"Pan, this is ridiculous! We're not going to fight you!" Trunks yelled, knowing full well that he couldn't overpower Pan by himself, even with Goku the odds weren't in their favor.

"Oh, does that mean you give up? Huh, tiny?" Pan teased, not backing down from her challenge even a little. "Either fight me or become my new playthings for as long as I want, what will it be?" Pan said, demanding a final answer.

What will Trunks' response be?

1. Trunks choose to accept Pan's challenge, both of them trying to attack Pan with low chances of success. With so many different ways to assert herself, how will Pan choose to defeat them?

2. Trunks backed down, and Pan announces her first plans for Trunks and Goku. Stuffing them into her sneakers to serve as insoles while she goes for a walk on a planet to look for the next Black Stared Dragonball. Unfortunately for them, it's a hot desert planet.

3. Trunks turned down the challenge. Pan says that she thinks it's about time she learned how to fly the ship, suggesting that Goku and Trunks help her out by monitoring her piloting skills from on top of her seat.

155333333331.title: Kage Bunshin no Jutsu

1553333333311.content:
"Naruto, get back here this instant!" yelled the Leaf Village Chunin as they chased after Naruto Uzumaki, who had stolen a scroll from Lady Tsunade's office.

Naruto jumped from treetop to treetop, skillfully evading capture from his pursuers before taking a sharp left after disappearing from their line of sight. He then jumped from the top of a tree onto a clearing in the forest "Haha finally lost them." Naruto said, taking the scroll out of his pocket. However Naruto didn't realize that he wasn't completely alone, watching him from a distance was Hinata Hyuga. Another young Genin who was one of his classmates back at the academy and one of the nine rookies that participated in the Chunin Exams. She had a crush on Naruto and would always watch him train at a distance when she wasn't out with her own team on a mission or training with Neji.

"Okay, let's get started. I'll master this jutsu in no time, believe it!" Naruto said confidently, opening the scroll and reading the hand signs off the paper. However, the text was smeared enough that he couldn't read the name of the Jutsu itself.

"Whatever, I think I got this." Naruto said in a self assured manner, if he could master a Jonin level technique like the Shadow Clone Jutsu than he could master this as well. Naruto took the stance displayed on the scoll and made the following hand signs "Ox, Boar, Monkey, Rat." infusing his chakra to activate the jutsu. Suddenly a large fog cloud appeared around Naruto, was this the jutsu he'd worked so hard to get? Some kind of Smokescreen Trap Jutsu, it might not be powerful but at the same time Naruto realized this could be a useful tool during battles. However Hinata still watching from a distance with her Byakugan saw this Jutsu for what it really was and moved in to help Naruto.

Soon enough the smoke cleared and Naruto also realized that the Jutsu wasn't what he originally thought. In truth didn't summon a smokescreen at all, it was a byproduct of the actually effects of the Shrinking Jutsu. Naruto realized this too late as he looked at how drastically his surrounding had changed in a few short moments, placing himself at about only an inch tall. Everything around him was gigantic, which also only could have meant that everyone back in the village was gigantic as well. Horrified by the thought of Sakura or Lady Tsunade finding him like this and punishing him.

"Na, Naruto." A shy voice called, as Hinata entered the clearing. She was was absolutely ginormous from Naruto point of view, stretching up taller than any of the buildings in the Hidden Leaf Village. The distance between him on the ground in front of her sandal clad and her face rivaling that of the range between the great stone faces and the village below. "What's Hinata doing here?" Naruto asked himself, finding it strange that she would be so close by to where he'd shrunk himself. Still he was glad to be found so quickly before some wild animal or bug made a meal out of him, now Hinata could help him get back to normal.

"Listen up Hinata, can you help me?" Naturo asked, causing Hinata to blush as she got down on one knee to get a closer look at her inch tall crush. She deactivated her Byakugan, finding it difficult to see him clearly. She was surprised at first by how small the Shrinking Jutsu had made him, definitely smaller than most if not all of Shino's bugs. Hinata then realized that she'd have to be extra careful if she didn't want to accidentally crush Naruto like one of Shino's bugs as well.

"Um yes, hold on ju-just one moment." Hinata said nervously thinking she had to be carefully about this. She couldn't keep Naruto in her ninja tool bag, too many sharp objects. And she couldn't very well carry him around for all the villagers to see, she knew of his dream to become Hokage and doubted that any of the villagers would ever respect him if they learned he shrunk himself accidentally to be carried around. That left her with only one option.

"So-Sorry about this Naruto." Hinata said timidly reaching towards Naruto, however she wasn't reaching to pick him up. Instead she positioned her fingers behind the shrunken Genin and pushed him forward into her toes, right between her big and second toes deep enough that he couldn't be seen. Naruto tried to fight back of course not realizing the reason for Hinata's actions but at her current size she was simply too strong to overpower, even though she was still trying to be gentle with him. Naruto's surroundings became very dark, accompanied by the odor of Hinata's feet which was only overpowered by the aroma of perfume. Aside from the fact that she was currently sweating being between Hinata's toes wasn't all bad, but it still wasn't the first place Naruto thought he'd end up when he got out of bed this morning.

Where does Hinata go next?

1. Hinata walks to the Hokage's Mansion to see if Lady Tsunade can reverse the effects of the Shrinking Jutsu. But first she feels as if Naruto needs to learn some kind of lesson first, deciding that he is the perfect size to receive her harshest punishmentsd.

2. Hinata thinks of this as the perfect opportunity to tell Naruto about her feelings for him and brings him back to the Hyuga Family Estate with the plans to do so. But can she bring herself to do it?

3. While she's walking Hinata's toes become sweaty, causing Naruto to slip out from between them. Leaving Naruto to be discovered by the next person passing through, his teammate Sakura.
1553333333311.title: Naruto Fails the Shrinking Jutsu

15533333333113.content:
Originally written by Steamgear (33)

Hinata was blushing heavily as she hurried away from the training field. She couldn't believe her crush was so tiny, or wedged between her toes, or asking her for help. She didn't know what to do or how to help him. Even at his miniscule size, Naruto could feel the effects of the shy Genin's nervousness. The heavy blush that seemed to radiate down the girl's entire body was making her toes notable warm, and to top it off she had also broken out in a sweat.

"How is she sweating so much?" Naruto asked himself rhetorically as a drop the salty liquid splashed across his face.

If he wasn't so focused on gagging at the taste of Hinata's sweat, Naruto may have noticed that with each step he was slowly slipping out of her grasp. Unfortunately, he didn't notice the side effect of the slick sweat until it was too late. As Hinata took yet another step forward, he was catapulted through the air, no longer surrounded by the hot embrace of the Hyuuga girl's foot and instead met with the whistle of wind rushing past him. Naruto hit the dusty earth hard, eliciting a groan from his tired body. Looking up to the sky, he swiftly saw it replaced with the blue treads of Hinata's sandals.

SLAM!

Before he even had a chance to call out for help, the young ninja was met with the unstoppable force of Hinata's next casual step. He was driven into the ground under her normally petite weight, now magnified a hundredfold by the shrinking Jutsu. Naruto thought for sure his body was going to pop like a grape, stomped to death by the very girl who had been kind enough to help him.

Then Hinata's weight lifted off of him. Naruto saw light return as Hinata's shapely rear, clad in tight blue pants, exited his field of vision. She continued walking, each step shaking the ground at Naruto's back. The orange garbed ninja was too tired to call out or give pursuit; too awed by his survival to think of getting her help. The quaking footsteps disappeared, growing fainter and fainter until Naruto was left in relative silence. Then the quakes started again as someone yet again approached.

"NARUTO!?" Came a girl's voice, it held a tone of shock and surprise.

Looking up once again, the tiny ninja was surprised to see, not the blue-haired, pale-eyed girl from before, but instead the fierce pink hair and determined gaze of Sakura, his teammate. She wore an expression that somehow mixed a frown with utter confusion. Naruto, on the other hand, went for a simple sigh of relief as he finally sat up and dusted himself off.

"Sakura! I need your help! I accidentally used a shrinking jutsu on myself!" The blonde Genin explained as he began to stand up.

In the process of standing up, Naruto became more and more aware of a shadow forming over head. Looking up, he saw a familiar and terrifying sight; he treaded sole of a female Genin's sandals fast approaching. With all the speed he could muster, Naruto formed a group of Shadow Clones which swiftly threw him free of the impact zone. He slid through the dirt as Sakura stomped down on the group of doppelgangers, each one giving a pained expression before vanishing in a puff of smoke.

"S-sakura! What the hell!?" Naruto yelled up at his teammate who was turning to face him, hands on her hips.

"You already missed out on training earlier today. I'm not letting you sneak out again, just because you're small." Sakura explained.

Naruto was left with no time to argue as his teammate lifted her foot up once more in preparation of stomp on him. This time Naruto was spurred on to fight back. He made the usual hand signal and in a flash, summoned a large group of Shadow Clones. Rather than throw himself free, Naruto and his clones held their hands up and braced for impact. As Sakura stamped her foot down, she was surprised to find Naruto was able to hold it up, with a little help of course. She couldn't help but smirk as she leaned forward, applying just a little more pressure.

Down below, Naruto saw his clones vanish one by one as the weight above increased. Soon it was only him and a handful of Shadow Clones, forced on their knees trying to hold up what felt like the weight of an entire world. Then with just an ounce more pressure, the remaining clones vanished in a puff of smoke. Naruto didn't even know what was happening as the sandal forced him down into the ground. The impact knocked the wind out of him and he found his body pinned down. The overwhelming mass above felt like it would turn his bones to dust in a matter of seconds. Then the weight somehow lightened, it was still heavy enough to pin him down without effort, but no longer enough to turn him into a red smear.

In a flash the weight was gone and Naruto was rolled on his back as the mass above swung to the side. Looking up, he know saw Sakura's barefoot, toes wiggling, sole dirty and marred from a long day of training. Apparently she had taken off her sandals while standing on him, then just now kicked it away.

"Time for round 2, Naruto," she giggled.

Suddenly Sakura's barefoot lunged at the shrunken Ninja. Naruto barely had enough time to leap away with the help of yet another Shadow Clone, one that swiftly turned to smoke as it was crunched between Sakura's hungry toes. Sakura continued her assault, swinging her foot back as all five toes scrunched up to grab the fleeing ninja. With the help of two more clones, Naruto pushed himself away from their reach. The poor doppelgangers were quickly snatched up like the last one. Though this time, one of the pair was unlucky enough to not vanish on the initial impact. Wedged between Sakura's big and second toe, the unfortunate clone was flicked off into the distance by the uncaring pink-haired goddess as she resumed her assault on Naruto.

Naruto quickly backed up as Sakura's right heel drove into the dirt before him. Unfortunately for him, this was her plan. His body was suddenly hit from behind by Sakura's sweaty toes and driven into the back of her heel. The fleshy appendages wrapped around Naruto like snakes, though far more foul smelling. Once there grip had been maintained, Sakura lifted her foot up, resting her heel on the back of her ass while balancing on one foot. She glanced over her shoulder and giggled as Naruto dangled helplessly.

"Looks like I've won two rounds so far. You're gonna have a long day ahead of you if this is how training is going to go." She said, struggling to keep a straight face as the tiny orange bug squirmed in her toes grip.

Naruto gulped as he realized for Sakura, this was only the beginning of what she had planned. What other painfully, disgusting, and/or humiliating "training" exercises were to come?

Choice 1: Sakura picks up Naruto and takes him to a nearby stump to prepare for their next training exercise. Naruto must now try to avoid getting smashed beneath his teammate's massive ass.

Choice 2: Sakura takes a seat on the ground and positions her feet at Naruto's sides like two walls of flesh, while Naruto tries his best to use all the clones he can muster in order to keep her at bay.

Choice 3: Sakura is interrupted by Hinata who realized Naruto wasn't between her toes anymore and is trying to find him. Sakura decides to use Hinata to unknowingly torment Naruto, by challenging her to a sparring match with Naruto at their feet. If Hinata wins, Sakura says she'll help her find Naruto.
15533333333113.title: Naruto VS Sakura

info.brief_description: This will be a different kind of Anime Shrinking/Growing story, where ideas come first.
info.description:
First off this is a Shrinking and Giantess Fetish Story, If this offends you please leave now. I understand that not everyone is into this kind of content and I respect that so please do the same. For those of you who are interested or at the very least curious please continue reading below.

I'm in the process of doing a major overhaul of my account before 5-15-2018 while I still can, I might renew my membership after that but I wanna have everything in order before then. So please follow the rules of the story and remember that any chapters that breaks the rules will be deleted.

These rules are.

-Do not write short chapters, anything under a certain length will be deleted. if you have questions if yours is long enough message me.

-Use proper grammar and punctuation, yes I'm serious. Take your time and don't rush through your additions.

-No Toilet, Scat, or Farting themed chapters, I don't care if you're into it. the majority of readers are not.

-You can previously claim a chapter you wish to write and I will make sure it stays that way for up to 2 weeks. Do not write for any chapter marked with "(Reserved)" because that means it's already taken.

-No Crossover content or OC's, not that I have much of a problem with them personally but it makes it much easier to follow up for everyone. Plus it's a better read in my opinion most of the time if everyone knows the character they are reading and writing about.

-Trades are open for people who interest me with their writing skills, email me on site and maybe we can trade chapters.

Last but not least, just because I'm writing a new anime story doesn't mean I'll be giving up on the other interactives I have. I might not add to some as often as others but the old anime story will be replaced by this one in due time. Myself and the other writers who added some of the chapters in the old story will be editing our works to fit the new format and give this story some content.

I really do hope that everyone will be able to enjoy this story as I continue to improve my writing skills in order to dish out better content for your enjoyment. Last but not least the Shrinking Scenarios will be listed in the main story after you enter via the normal link below, however the Giantess Scenarios will only be accessible through the Zero Story link that follows this short paragraph. Please enjoy. ---> https://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/2156248-Anime-ShrinkingGiantess-Sc...
